25b7(rgyud 'grel): rab 'bring dgu dang gsum dang ni// dbye bar bya ba'i don shes bya// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni// skye ba 'di la lung ston pas// phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rkyen ni rab tu ma 
25b8(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// rab kyi 'bring sogs ldan pas ni// bar mdo la lung ston 'gyur// rab kyi tha ma ldan pa ni// skye ba phyi ma lung ston no// 'bring gi gsum po rigs ldan yang // gnyis dang gsum 
26a1(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhi ru sbyar// tha ba'i rigs ldan gsum po yang // lnga dang drag dang bdun du sbyar// yang na rkyer sogs ldan 'gyur yang // rgyu la sogs pa'i rus pa rnams// drag zhan gyin 
26a2(rgyud 'grel): rus pa yis// rkyen gyi tshul bzhi sbyor zhes bya'o// nA khyer gnyig 'bring sogs kyi// rim pa dang ro ldan pa rnams// gong ma gnyis dang mi mthun pas// gsum dang mdun du sbyor shes bya'o// 
26a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka gzhan par gyur pa ni// gsang sngags gnod du mi rung bas// dbang bskur mi bya 'jug pa tsam// dge ba'i sa bon chung bgyur yang // smon lam btab pa'i dad ldan te// gsang sngags 
26a4(rgyud 'grel): la ni mos 'gyur nas// yang dang yang du gsol 'debs la// phyi yi dbang bskur tsam byas la// mi zab dbyings kyi man ngag bstan// de la bstan pa'i gang zag la// lhag pa rnams ni rim gyis
26a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan// yang na rnal 'byor rim pa ni// yid ma lnga sogs so so ru// so sor bag chags bzhag pa dang // mos pa la sogs rim pa yis// the tsom la sogs med mod kyi// dngos grub 'grub
26a6(rgyud 'grel): par ma gyur na// sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du shes kyis// tha mi dad par bsgoms nas kyang // man ngag yang yang spos kyang ni// 'gal ba med de dngos grub 'grub// de ltar byas kyang ma byung na// sgrib pa/ 
26a7(rgyud 'grel): shin tu chog spang bsaM// sbyin sreg tshegal 'khor bzlas brjod dang // gtor ma la sogs cho ga yis// bdun ras stong gi bar du ni// mkhas pas ci rus rgyud brtags la// tshogs sdig pa byang 
26a8(rgyud 'grel): bar gsungs// dper na/ lus kun la ni gnod pa yi// tshor ba'i phung pos lam rnams 'gags// po yi sbyor ba mkhas pa yis// bsregs pas thams cad med par byed// de nas 
26b1(rgyud 'grel): la ba ni bskyed nas ni// gang du phyin par 'gro bar byed// de bzhir sngags sogs pa tha rnams kyis// sgrib pa la sogs bcom ngas kyang // ting nge 'dzin gyi lam bskyed nas// dngos grub 
26b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang ni thob par 'gyur// dngos grub khyad par ma thob ra// phra mo la sogs thob par 'gyur// mtshan ma'i lung ston phra bo 'byung // gal te de ltar ma gyur par// tshe dbang ma thob rnal 'byor pas/ 
26b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa rnams ni byang gyur nas// skye ba phyi ma la sogs su// dngos grab kyang ni thob par 'gyur// yang ra sngags kyi mthu yos ni// sdig sgrib tu de nas mchod kyang // cher long rags pa
26b4(rgyud 'grel): mgo bcom nas// gzhan dag mi skye mgo garod cing // dam tshig ma nyams bshags la brtson// smon lam dge ba bsngo legs pas// skye ba 'di rjes gzhan dag tu// dus dang 
26b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang slob dpor dang // rigs dang phyag rgya man ngag sogs// skyes ma thag tu rnyed par 'gyur// de ru dam tshig ldan sogs pas// rim gyis skye bdun brgyad nas su// 'bad rtsol 
26b6(rgyud 'grel): drag po ma byas par// sangs rgyas sa la 'gro bar gsungs// de sogs lung bstan sbyor ba rnams// mkha' 'gro ma yi lung ston du// rnal 'byor mkhas pas shes par bya'o// 'dir 
26b7(rgyud 'grel): ni blo dmar don ched du// cung zad bsdus te bstan pa yin// mkha' 'gro ma yis lung bstan yang // 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// 'jig rten 'das la gnyis yod de// sa gnas 
26b8(rgyud 'grel): rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro dang // bde gshegs byin brlabs mkha' 'gro'o// mkha' 'gro de dag gnyis ka yang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang mi mdzes pa'i// gzugs dang sna tshogs sprul 
27a1(rgyud 'grel): nas ston// de la 'jigs dang mi 'jigs dang // re dang dogs pa'i sems spangs te// phyag rgya brdal sogs pa yi// ston pa'i dus su lan rnams ni// ston par shes par 
27a2(rgyud 'grel): ma nus na// dngos grub med de nyams par 'gyur// de bas nan tan cher bskyed de// man ngag thos pa che bag ces// thos pa che bar ma gyur kyang // gang ba sgrub rgyud skor la sogs la// slob dpon 
27a3(rgyud 'grel): la ni yang nas yang // the tso mchod par mnyan par bya// rgyud rnams thos par mi nus pas// bsgrub pa'i chas rkyen bcu bdun po// shes par de ni ma byas na// dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur 
27a4(rgyud 'grel): ro// slob dpon tha mal brten pas// mtshang yang ni 'grub par gsung // 'jig rten pa la gnyis yod de// rgyal bas bka' la btags pa yi// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang // bdud ni/ 
27a5(rgyud 'grel): nag po la sogs pa// dpal ma thogs par chod mkhan// de ltar gnyis su ma shes na// dngos grub thob kyang sla ral 'chor// de gnyis gzugs dang rtags sogs kyang // gong ma bzhin du 
27a6(rgyud 'grel): ston pas na// de yi rim pa'ang gong bzhin bya// de yang brtag pa'i cho ga yang // zhag gsum zhag bdun rtsa gcig tu// re dogs la sogs thams cad kur// spangs nas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 
27a7(rgyud 'grel): la// nan tan du ni brtson 'grus bya// tshogs 'khor la sogs yang dang yang // byed pa'i dus su rdo rje klu// byed cing phyag rgya sogs ston pas// ting 'dzin phyag rgya gsal ba dang // mtshan 
27a8(rgyud 'grel): la sogs gsal 'bar zhing // gzugs dang skra dang dri la sogs// thams cad brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba// lha yi mtshan mar shar bar bya// de las bzlog pa thams cad kun// bdud kyi rtags 
27b1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ mkha' 'gro'i lung du bstan pas na// 'dir ni bsgrub pa'i don du bsdus// bsgrub pa'i cha rkyen mnang ngag rnams// bsgrub pa nyams su len pa la/ 
27b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan cing spel na bsod nams 'phel// nyams su mi len ser sna can// rdzas dang lus srog la sogs pa// bla ma la ni 'bul mi rus// de la man ngag bstan mi bya// de la man ngag bstan pa 
27b3(rgyud 'grel): na// dngos grub nyams te sdig pa 'phel// dam tshig nyams te mkha' 'gros gsod// cha rkyen la sogs bcu bdun po// ston pa phyag na rdo rje yis// sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la// rnab 
27b4(rgyud 'grel): brgad pa'i man ngag de// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la bstan// de ni ro langs mal bsgyur// gnod sbyid phyag na rdo rje la// brgyud pa'i man ngag rim pa rnams// nan tan gyi ni btsa' bar bya// de la 
27b5(rgyud 'grel): bca' bar shes na// dper na yid bzhin nor bu ni// klu rgyal gtsug nas rnyed nas ni// 'dab rdzab nang du stong pa bzhin// de bzhin man ngag rin chen 'di// lus ngag yid gsum dka' ba yi// 
27b6(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas slob dpon la btsal nas// dam med rmongs pa'i lag shor na// dngos grub mi thob nyams par 'gyur// de bas nar tan bskyed de btsa'// lung bstan pa'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// 
27b7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sems can rtsod ldan gyi// dus su rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// dam tshig nyams pa mang 'byung bas// yo byad rdzas chung sgrub pa pos/ 
27b8(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa 'phel du mi gzhug phyir// maN+Dal tshogs bskang ba ni// dang po rnal 'byor 'gyod sems kyis// shin tu gus pas maN+Dal bca'// maN+Dal bca' ba'i thabs bstan pa// sa gzhi 
28a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu ma'i dpal// ston spangs yon kan ldaran pa yi// maN+Dal ldani bca' byaste// dang po maN+Dal dkar po bca'// gnyis pa sngon po dag tu bya// gsum pa ma 
28a2(rgyud 'grel): ka rAg tu bya// bzhi pa seng po dag du bya// lnga pa dmar po dag dbye// dkar rje dang ni batha dang // yaHna rtswa sngon po dog gi/ gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa ni// mtshal la sogs pa'i rigs 
28a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// kur kum la sogs dag dang // sbyar ba'i nag po rigs dag gis// kha dog bsnang bar bstan pa yir// yang ra thams cad dkar dang sngo// de gnyis gcig gis bya ba yin// bsus 
28a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas mkhas pas shes par bya// ba yi rnam pa lta dang ni// bdud rtsi rna pa lnga dag ni// rdzas grub can gyi snong du ba zha// den che bum pa la sogs kyi// skyon spangs yon tan ldan pa yi// sA 
28a5(rgyud 'grel): dra thar mong byed par rdzas// dzin par med du ma rung ngo // brgyan 'bras bu can rtseH// dang song bdag nyid rdal 'byor bas// tha ma la 'du shes spangs nas re// lha ying rgyal ldan pa yis// dang babum 
28a6(rgyud 'grel): pa byin gyis brlab// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis gdab// oM a pre Tha kAn Da li trAM// nyi shu rtsa gcig bdan du gang ba// gong gi bkra shis snod kyi rdzas// bdud rtsi 'khyil bas btab nas kyang / 
28a7(rgyud 'grel): dang po bum pa'i chus srab sang // bdud rtsi 'khrul pa'i sngags kyang bkras// thugs ka'i a las twa ba yaM// dkyil 'khor chen po nyid du bsam// oM matsan+da maN+Da la nA// bdun dang lnga dang gsum du 
28a8(rgyud 'grel): bzlas// tsan danalas kyi bum pa bsam// yi ge du 'phos tsan dan sog/ de las la 'bros pas pa// lagang // oMng+ga bswa pa/ dz+dza// zhes pa lan bdur bzlas so// me tog lnga dang gnyis gcig la/ 
28b1(rgyud 'grel): kha dog mtshan nyid shes byas la// yi ge paM las pad+ma ni// stong ldan brgad ldan dag tu ni// gyur par bsams nas sngags bzlas dgram// oM paM pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/ zhes gong ma bzhin du/ 
28b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o// de steng b+hU las gzhal yas khang // lnga dang gnyis dang gcig tu bya// de nas thams cad kun la yang // gsum du bya bar 'dod pa'ang yod// zla ba pad+ma gzhal yas khang // 
28b3(rgyud 'grel): gsam dang gnyis dang gcig tu yang // rnal 'byor bsdus dang rgyas pa ni// nyams pa che chung go rims so// de nas rnal 'byor bdag nyid dang // dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor kun// 
28b4(rgyud 'grel): khras byas gos ni bzang po go// rgyan chal sogs mdzes par bya// shar ram rub tu kha bltas te// so so lnga yi ting 'dzin bskyed// rdo rje dril bu byin gyis brlab// rdo rje dril bus bskul 
28b5(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // tshigs bcad dag gis gsol ba btab// sngags kyi rgyal po mtha' la gdags// thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// yi ge bzhi 'gros lha mor gyur// bla ma yi dam lha dang 
28b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// gsang sngags bdag po dkyil 'khor lnga// dkon mchog gsum sogs spyan drangs nas// tha ma sbyangs nas mi bskyod 'gyur// mchod yon mchod sogs rgyas par dbul// dza 
28b7(rgyud 'grel): sngon du phyag rnams bya// gzhan yang mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// mchod nas bstod brnyas par bya// do nas sngags bzlas 'od zer gyis// lnga rnams la ni pho gnas su// 'od zer bsku 
28b8(rgyud 'grel): nas tshor la 'dus// nyams pa'i lus la po gnas su// ba spu'i khung zhugs sdig pa bsdus// snying khar yi ge kang ma ni// 'od nag tu ni gyur par bsam// srog go 'dus kyi sngan 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): byung // lha dang bdag gi bar du ni// pad+ma nag po'i gdan bsams la// sdig pa'i gzugs de de ru bzhag/ de nas yi dam lha yi sngags// bzlas pa'i 'od zer 'khrul 
29a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyis// sdig pa rnams ni sbyang bar bya// yang na/ sdig pa de nyid spangs nas kyang // lus kyi lhag ma spang ba'am// de nas yi ge brgya ba yis// man ngag bzhin du bsgoms nas kyang // / 
29a3(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin du spang bar bya// yang ni/ yi ge brgya pa gcig bus bya// yi ge brgya pa 'bur dang ni// rang gi snying po 'bum gyis ni// rtsa ba nyams pa chen po skongs// sum cha bri bas gnyis pa
29a4(rgyud 'grel): skongs// phyed bribs ri gsum pa bskongs// sum gnyis bri bas bzhi pa skongs// sum cha'i sum cha bribs ni// lnga bskongs te drug pa ni// sum gnyis gribs skongs pa'o// de yi 
29a5(rgyud 'grel): phyed byed bribs ni// tha ma gsum gyis go rim sbyor// yan lag brgyad dang brgya phreng dang // nyi shu rtsa gcig dag gis so// che chung rim pa dag gis ni// tha ma me'am chu yis ni// sbyin 
29a6(rgyud 'grel): sreg dag gis sbyin par bya// gsang sngags bdag gam bdud rtsi 'khyil// rta mgrin bum pa gong bzhin bcas// byin rlabs la logs byas nas ni// tha ma dag par bkru ba'o// sbyar sreg 
29a7(rgyud 'grel): khrus dang ldan pa'am// yang na maN+Dal bzlas pa yis// cho ga gcig pus bur yang rung // dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba yi// kyor ka 'di la brtson par bya'o// dam tshig nyams pa bskor 
29a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sbyor ka sde nyi shu dag pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang gi rim pa bstan pa ni// bum ba gsang ba ye shes dang // bzhi par bstan pa de rnams la/ 
29b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas ni yid 'ong la sogs su// dus la sogs pa 'dzom pa dang // slob dpon slob ma mtshan nyid ldan// sngon gyi gleng gni rjes mthun par// dkyil 'khor byas nas slob ma gzhug/ dbang 
29b2(rgyud 'grel): bskur rim pa ma nor bar// rnam grangs rnams ni shes par bya// bskur thabs man dag shes byas la// bskur ba'i gnas kyang ma nor ba rtag/ de ltar byas pas sgrib pa 'brang // sa yang 
29b3(rgyud 'grel): rim gyis non par 'gyur// de phyir man ngag bstan par bya// rtags la sogs pa'ang shes par bya// brda' mi shes na sngags pa min// las dang po yis rdzas la brten// dgos pa shes 
29b4(rgyud 'grel): na the tsom med// nus pa mthu dang ldan pas ni// 'bras bu khyad par thob par 'gyur// de dag spri dang khyad par ni// cho ga man ngag rgyas pa rnams// rgyud 'grel kun na gsal bas na// 
29b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ru bdag gis mdo tsam bsdus// bum pa'i dbang ni rnam bzhi ste// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // mthar thug pa ru shes par bya// phyi ni byi rgyud dag dang mthun// nang ni nang rgyud dag dang 
29b6(rgyud 'grel): mthun// yang na gnyis ka phyi ru bstan// nang gi slob dpon lus la bzhag/ gsang ba yul ni nyid la sbyar// mthar thug slob ma mgo bo ru// dga' ba bskyed pa'am rdo rje'i rtse// de rnam 
29b7(rgyud 'grel): man ngag rgyas bshad pa// las kyi phreng bar shes par bya// gsang ba dbang la bzhi ru bstan// byi ni bdud rtsi byin rlabs sbyin// yang na mtshan ldan phab nas ni// srin mtheb dag gis 
29b8(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bya// nang gi gsang ba pho brang nas// lag pa'i phyag rgya gzung nas sbyin// gsang ba yum gyi mkha' nas blang // mthar thug gsang ba'i pho brang du// mchog dga' skyes par she 
30a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// shes rab ye shes la yang bzhi// byi ni las ni phyag rgya ma// nang ni 'od kyi rig ma yin// gsang ba bya gdong ma la b+ha// mthar thug dregs 'dzin 
30a2(rgyud 'grel): gtum mo yin// mthar thag la ni gnyis su bstan// rten bcas dang ni zhen med do// rten med la yang gnyis su bstan// spos bcas dang ni spros med do// dbang gi man ngag rgyas
30a3(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa// slob por zhal gyi man ngag dang // las kyi phreng bar shes par bya// brda' yi chog bdo tsam bstan// ka la sha a b+hi She ka zhes pa ni// bul pa'i ngag brda' lus kyi brda'// 
30a4(rgyud 'grel): lag pa'i sor mo bskongs nas ni// rtse mo bsdus pa'i bum ba'i tshul// guh+ya a b+hi Sha ka zhes pa// gsang ba'i ngag brda lus kyi brda'// sdom pos khro mo gnon po ni// lag pa 'drin shes par 
30a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// pra dz+nyA na guHa b+hi She ka zhes pa ni// shes rab ye shes ngag gi brda'// lus kyi brda' ni lha sbyin brda'// yang na khyad par dga' ba mtshon// pra dzA dz+nyA na gu h+ya a b+hi She ka zhes pa ni/ 
30a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'i ngag brda lus kyi brda'// lhan cig dga' ba skyes sa ru// mthe bo bcug nas mtshon par bya'o// de ltar brda rnams ma shes na// mkha' 'gro dngo sa grub ster ba na// brda rnams dris 
30a7(rgyud 'grel): nas ster bar byed// brda rnams mi shes slar la 'tshoro// yang na brda rnams gzhan po yang // ma shes na ni mkha' 'gros gsod// brda la sogs bam shes na// gsang sngags spyod pa'i dus// 
30a8(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// 'byung po nyams song gsal ba dang // mu stegs shan 'dres 'byung ba dang // phyag dang phyag gi lan dus su// brda mi shes na sngags pa min// dbang bskur ba yi rim pa yang / 
30b1(rgyud 'grel): chags lam grol lam gnyis shes bya'o// dbang bskur med na 'bras bu med// de bas dbang bskur nan tar bya// dbang gi sbyor ka ste sum cu pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin 
30b2(rgyud 'grel): ba la phyag 'tshal lo// dam tshig rnams ni cung zhig bstan// dang po spyod pa'i dam tshig ni// cha gsol ba spyod lam grol lam spyod// de ltar gnyis ka spyod pa la// dang po mchog dang rab 
30b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog go// de la yang ni phyi dang ngo // dang po phyi yi spyod dus su// yul dang dus kyi gnas skabs kyis// zhibs 'dul dang drag pos 'dul// mthun 'jug spyod pa mkhas shing zab// zas 
30b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gos sogs thams cad kyang // rang dang gzhan ni gnyis ka la// pan sems spyod pas 'jug bya'o// phan sems med pa nyon mongs can// bdag gzhon lha dang snying rje spangs// 'gro 
30b5(rgyud 'grel): don mchod pa spangs pas na// dam tshig nyams te ngan 'thor ltung // ngan spyod dus ni bstan pa ni// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa la// chags pa'i lam pas 'jug par bya// grol ba'i lam pas 
30b6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs// de ltar byin brlabs bdud rtsi balnga// thams cad lta ba sgoms mchod byas na// bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur// khyi phag spyod pa bzhin byas na// dam tshig 
30b7(rgyud 'grel): nyams te yi dwags sa// chang ni bdud rtsi chen po ste// btung bar bya ba kho na yin// zhes rmad las gsungs pa ste// mtshan dang ldan pa'i snod mchog tu// rul sogs skyon rnams spangs pa/ 
30b8(rgyud 'grel): yi// bdud rtsi ro ldan sdod bkang ste// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya// a las ka pA la ni bskyed// zla ba dang ni de yis bskyed// has ni gzugs sogs rnam rtog sbyangs// hri/ sa ni ro 
31a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnam rtog sbyangs// hoHsa ni bdud rtsi chen por bzhu// mthe bong dzA las gzhi'i tshul// srin mtheb sum las ri rab tshul// bar na mi 'phros bdud rtsi bkug 
31a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gzhan lnga ni mchod byas pas// bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur// de ltar ma byas glang chen bzhin// chags shing brkams sogs myos 'thung na// skye ba lnga brgyar smon par 
31a3(rgyud 'grel): skye// byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa yang // yang rigs lnga yi sbyor sogs bya// yang na mA ma kI yis sbyang // yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil sogs bya// mtshan ldan snod de chos 'byung dang // 
31a4(rgyud 'grel): zlo ba la sogs bsam byas la// mchod par bya ba'am yang na bdun// spyigatsug tha ma gzhag byas la// sku gsung thugs ni gnas gsum bzhag/ de nas 'thor zhing mchod pa yis// 
31a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya sngags kyis dbul bar bya// so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags la a mri ta kuN Da li zhes pa'am// a mri ta khA hi zhes pa gang yang rung // gsum gsum kun la dbul bar bya// de nas 
31a6(rgyud 'grel): rang snying lha gsal la// ci ran gnod pa med tsam btung // nad la gnod par gyur kyang ni// thigs pa gsum ni dam tshig go/ grol bas kyang ni mchod pa yi// dus su bdung bar bya 
31a7(rgyud 'grel): phyir ni// yul dus gnas skabs sbyar te btung // btung ba la sogs gzhan po yang // bdud rtsi ma byas 'thung byed pa// yi dgas gnas su skye bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i spyod pa'i 
31a8(rgyud 'grel): dus su ni// phyag rgya ma ni bsten pa yang // rnal 'byor chags pa'i lam pas ni// rtags ldan mtshan nyid la sogs ldan// de ltar bstan pa'i gnas skabs ni// dbang bskur rnam gnyis 
31b1(rgyud 'grel): dus dang ni// mchod pa'i dus dang ting 'dzin ni// ye shes skye ba bogs dbyung b+hir// dam tshig tu ni bstan pa yin// yang na bskyed rim bstan pa dang // rlung rnams las su rung 'gyur na// 
31b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i dngos grub myur 'dod phyir// phyag rgya la ni brten par bya// rnal 'byor grol ba'i lam pas ni// yid kyi lha mo gzugs mdzes ma// mchod pa'i dus su dam tshig go/ de nas 
31b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro lung ston dus// dngos grub myur du thob 'dod na// mkha' 'gro'i man ngag la brten no// de ltar go rims ma shes na// dam tshig nyams te srin bur skye// sangs rgyas 
31b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa 'jig pa la// 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba shes bzhin du// mi rtsom pa ni dam tshig nyams// mi shes gnod pa mi byed la// byed na yang ni dam tshig nyams// de sogs sbyor ba gzhan 
31b5(rgyud 'grel): po yang // man ngag gis ni shes par bya// mchog gi spyod pa'i dus su ni// brtul zhugs smyon pa lkugs pa dang // gcer bu la sogs dus skabs sbyar// de ltar ma shes dam tshig nyams// 
31b6(rgyud 'grel): rab mchog gi ni dus dag tu// don dam rang bzhin med pa'am// sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin la brten nas// rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin dus su ni// spyod pa la sogs byed pa ni// dam tshig nyams te bogs 
31b7(rgyud 'grel): chung ngo // mthun 'jug spyod pa 'gal ba med// lta ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni// chos rnams sems kyi 'khrul pa ste// sems las ma gtogs chos rnams med// chos su snang ba 'khrul 
31b8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems// sems nyid de yang skye med phyir// yod med mtha' las 'das pa'o// bsam du med cing brjod du med// dper na nam mkha' ji bzhin no// lta spyod kyi dam tshig gi sbyor ka 
32a1(rgyud 'grel): ste sum cu gcig pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// rab gnas chog bstan pa bya// sku gzugs la sogs kun la ni// rab tu gnas pa ma byas 
32a2(rgyud 'grel): mu stegs lnga rten bcas dang 'dra'o// rigs dang na tshod med pa'i mi// thams cad kun gyis bkar mi byed// de bzhin 'dir yong skra sogs la// phyag la sogs pa byas gyur kyang // 
32a3(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams chen po thob mi 'gyur// bsod napas chen po thob 'dod ra// rab gnas byas pas thob par 'gyur// de bas rab gnas bya ba gces// slob dpon mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// 
32a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni// so so rang rang bsnyen pa bya// de ltar mi 'grub rnal 'byor pas// shAka thub bsnyen pa kun gyi ma// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bsnyen pa yis// gsang sngags thun mong 
32a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yi// bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs byas la// de nas sa chog la sogs pa// gzhan dang mthun par rgyas par bya// maN+Dal byi dor legs byas la// rgyan dang rol mo la sogs 
32a6(rgyud 'grel): dgram// lha yi sta gon rdzogs byas la// de nas bum pa'i sta gon bya// maN+Dal me tog bcal bkram la// bdag nyid lnga ru bsgoms nas su// yungs kar ni mib lag gnyis kyis// 
32a7(rgyud 'grel): blangs na sa gas ma gsum mer bstab bya// oM sarba pA baM da ga na badz+rA ya/ sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra sAhA// chu sI ba ba bkang ba lan gsu bablugs// bla bas zar chub sre snod thogs// lan/ 
32a8(rgyud 'grel): gsum byabs de mer bcas rnams// phyi rol dag tu bskyal bar bya// nam mkha' lha bkang spos thogs nas// dkyil 'khor lha la gsol ba gdab// rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// 
32b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes tshigs bcad la sogs bsgrags par bya'o// de nas maN+Dal steng du ni// sku gdung la sogs bzhag byas la// slob dpon nub tu gnas nas ni// oM hUM baM a zhes brjod pas// ba yi rnam 
32b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga gang yin pa// de ni mar chu sbyar ba dang // dri zhi ma tsan dar rku nyid dang // 'dag chal shing shun chu gsum ni// byin brlabs dur bas rim bzhin bsku// u du ma ba ra b+ha ra tra dang // tsa 
32b3(rgyud 'grel): ba le ke na dang ni// a shwad byang chub shing gang rnyed// zhi ba btags chur sbyar snod g.yas bzhag/ de nas khrus rnams rim par bya// de la sogs pa'i cho ga yis// sku gzugs sta gon 
32b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// de rjes rab gnas brtsam par bya// sku rnams so so'i sa bon las// cho ga gsum sogs gang 'dod bskyed// ye shes lha yang / 
32b5(rgyud 'grel): so sor bstim// sku gdung bstan par bskyed cing bstim// glegs bam so so'i snying po 'am// yang na A li kA li 'am// so so'i dkyil 'khor dag kyang rung // lha khang la sogs kun la 
32b6(rgyud 'grel): yang // so so'i dkyil 'khor gang 'dod bya// yang na/ yi ge b+h+rUM ni rten yin la// de la brten pa gang 'dod pa'o// rdo rje dril bu dag la ni// hUM dang a yis sa bon las// d+harma a badz+ra hUM zhes 
32b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bskyed pa byas nas ni// phyag mtshan lha ni gang 'dod bstim// phyag mtshan la sogs gzhan la yang // phyag mtshan snying po lha gsum dang // sgrub pa po yi las dang sbyar// 
32b8(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba la yang de bzhin no// mtshan ldan yi ge a yin no// rgyan dang rgyan cha la sogs pa// byin gyis brlab pa tsam ni bya// de dag thams cad kun la yang // bskyed dang bstim pa byas 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// de rus byin brlabs dbang bskur b+ha// de nas mchod lnga dbul bar bya// de 'og lA ste la sogs brgyad// mchod pa nyi shu po yang bya// gos dang rgyal mtsha 
33a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa// rin chen bkra shis sgra dang ni// rol mo la sogs chog rnams// rgyas par bral nas bstod pa bya// de nas bzlas brjod cir na bya// spyan 'byed sngags la sogs 
33a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// klog phreng rgyud du shes par bya// yang na phyag mtshan la sogs kyi// cho ga bsdus par shes par bya// shin tu bsdus pa'i cho ga sogs// byin gyi brlabs la sogs pa tsam// 
33a4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rab gnas zin nas ni// bra ma mkhas pa de la ni// ci bdog yon rnams dbul bar bya// des ni bsod nams chen po thob// ji ltar phongs par gyur yang ni// mchod pa'i yo byad 
33a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni dbul// ser sna can ni dpral mi nus// des ni sdig 'phel bsod nams med// rab gnas bzang po zin nas ni// rab gnas bzang por gshegs su gsol// rab tu gnas 
33a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor ka ste sum cu gnyis pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// 'chi ba bru ba'i man ngag ni// 'chi rtags rnam par bstan pa dang // 'chi bla cho ga rgyas pa rnams// / 
33a7(rgyud 'grel): 'chi bla chen por shes par bya// 'dir ni bslab pa don du ni// gos sngon 'chi ba blu ba mchog/ man ngag cung zhig bkol nas bstan// spyir ni 'chi ba bla ba la// dge ba'i phyogs ni mtha' 
33a8(rgyud 'grel): yas mchog/ gang byas kyang ni zlogs par 'gyur// gos sngon 'chi klu'i rim pa yang // nad pa sems ni dag pa yis// gos sngon rna rgyud man ngag can// mkhas pa de ni spyan 
33b1(rgyud 'grel): drangs la// gnas khang dgon par maN+Dal bya// maN+Dal byas pa'i 'og tu ni// rgyan rnams ma lus dgram par bya// nad pa la ni chos bshad la// dang po sems ni dag par bya// sgyu ma lta 
33b2(rgyud 'grel): bu'i sems kyis ni// nor rnams ma lus thams cad dang // rang lus srog dang bcas pa dbul// de ltar dbul ba de la ni// dang po dbang bskur rdzogs pa la// de nas man ngag gzhan
33b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs bya// de ltar byas 'og sos 'gyur la// rang 'tsho rdzas tsam slar la sbyin// nor rdzas srog rnams dbul mi nus// ser sna can ni bzlog par dka'// de ltar ser sna can de la/ 
33b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur mi bya gzhan po bya// cho ga'i rim pa bstan pa ni// rgyas par byed na bskyed rim rdzogs par bya// yang na bsngos dang shin tu bsdus// de ltar byas 'og nad pas ni// khrus kyi rim// 
33b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs byas la// gos bzang byin brlabs bskyon nas ni// shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas nas// mdun du maN+Dal lnga byas te// dang po phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul// de nas sdig 
33b6(rgyud 'grel): bshags la sogs bya// nad pa de ni mi nus na// mchod g.yog dag gi byed du gzhug/ de nas skyabs gsol tshigs bcad brjod// bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can// sku mchog stobs ldan 
33b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod phyag 'tshal// gsung mchog sgra mchog 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs mchog ye shes ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// sku mchog stobs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas lus 'bul 
33b8(rgyud 'grel): zhes ni sbyar// bdag la gnod pa'i nad rnams kun// khyod kyi mthu yi sbyang du gsol// 'byung po'i gnod pa bzlog tu gsol// zor dang dug rnams thams cad kyang // mthu stobs 
34a1(rgyud 'grel): 5/ bdag pos bzlog pa gsol// bcom ldan khro chen rnam par rgyal// sku gsung thags lngan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan mgon po nag po che// lus ngan rgyal po/ 
34a2(rgyud 'grel): mthu bo che// khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'dzegs chen po// rolangs ma ni mthu mo che// rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma// 'jigs byed ma ni mthu mo che// rdo rje lha mo/ 
34a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od bskyed pa// rdo rje lha mo yid 'phrog ma// rdo rje lha mo kun bzangs ma// rdo rje lnga mo klu sgra can// khro mo chen me srog gcod ma// khro bo chen mo dbugs rngub ma// khro mo chen mo khrag 
34a4(rgyud 'grel): 'thung mo// khro mo chen mo sha za ma// sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar bar bya'o// de nas sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug/ de bzlas pas ni bzlog par bya'o// dang po sku'i bzlas pa'i 
34a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis// lus kyi nad rnams sbyar bar bya'o// de nas thugs dang gsung gis sbyang // thal chen rak+Sha byang chub sems// spang sogs byin brlabs byas nas ni// gnas gsum dag/ 
34a6(rgyud 'grel): tu mtshan cig byug/ de nas khrus kyi bum pa yis// bkra shis tshigs bcad bdon nas ni// nad rnams sdig sgrib bkru bar bya// de nas sku gsung thugs kyi sngags// bzlas pas bder 
34a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs 'od zer bstim// de nas nad pa'i steng phyogs su// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bzhugs bsams la// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes bdud rtsi snying khar gzung // 
34a8(rgyud 'grel): de rnams byas pas 'chi ba ba thog/ 'chi thog chen po bya ba ni// sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor dbang bskur bya// gtor chen la sogs gzhan yang bya'o// de ltar byas pas 'chi bai bzlog/ rang dang 
34b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ni gnyis ka la// man ngag stobs kyis bzlog pa ni// rlung dang thig le yi ge dang // gtum mo 'khor lo la sogs ni// 'chi bla chog dag dang ni// bla ma'i man ngag brgyud pas bya'o// 'chi 
34b2(rgyud 'grel): ba bru ba'i sbyor ka ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// stang skabs rim pa cung zhig bstan// shar phyogs g.yas brkyang la gnas nas// 
34b3(rgyud 'grel): rkang pad ngo ni lag pa yis// rdo rje rtse gsum stang stabs bya// gar bsgyur de ni thabs re bya// rkang lag mthun par bsgyur ba bzlog/ lho ru g.yon brkyang la gnas nas// ral gri'am dbug
34b4(rgyud 'grel): to 'dzin pas su// rkang pa lag pa gnyis ka su// sa dang bar snang gnyis ka la// rin chen 'bar mthe bar bya// nub phyogs g.yas brkyang la gnas nas// 'khor lo'am ral gri de bzhin bre// 
34b5(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs g.yon brkyang la gnas nas// rdo rje rgya gram tshul du bri// yang na zlum po la sogs rim// bsrung ba'i tshul du bya ba dang // phyogs bzhir 'byung po bkug nas ni// mnan cing bsnun pa'i 
34b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bya// gzhan yang skad skabs rgyas pa ni// snyoms 'jug la sogs rgyud na gsal// mkhas pas de ru shes par bya// 'dir ni bsgrub pa'i don du bsdus// stang stabs sbyor ba 'di dag ni// 
34b7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad don du nan tan bya'o// snang stabs kyi sbyor ka ste sum cu bzhi pa'o// // ston pa phyag na rdo rje nas// mkha' 'gro ma ni yan chad du// brgyud pa'i rim pa'i man ngag 'di/ 
34b8(rgyud 'grel): snying po la sogs sgrub pa'o// gsang ba'i slob ma rin chen bkra// de rtsa sde rnal 'byor dang // brtul chen po ni rnal 'byor la// logasum bar du snod brtags nas// bde ldan rin chen yang 
35a1(rgyud 'grel): gter du// bka' rtsa dam bzhag byas nas ga dang // rin chen rdzas dang srog lus kyis// bla ma mnyes pas man ngag thob// de bzhin phyi rabs rnal 'byor gyis// de 
35a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du shes par bya'o// phyi rabs blo dman la sogs shing // ser sna la sogs g.yo sgra can// sgom bsgrub la sogs mi nus la// man ngag bstan na dam tshig nyams// de bas phyir bas 
35a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas// snod ldan brtags la sbyin par bya// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// rin chen phreng ba sbyor ka 'di// bdag gi snod ldan don brtsams pas// 'di brtsams pa yi dge 
35a4(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang // bla med byang chub thob par shog/ sbyor ka chen po'i man ngag/ slob dpon chen po b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // dge slong tshul khrims 
35a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nus bskur to// / @// phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gtor ma'i cho ga bzhugs so// // @#// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra pA Ni nI laM bA ra dA ra ba li ta bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ phyag na 
35a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gtor ma'i cho ga/ 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor rnams la phan gdags phyir// bdag gis gtor ma bshad par bya// phar 
35a7(rgyud 'grel): gdags pa dang tshar bcad pa// phan pa mchog dang thun mong ngo // gsang ba bla med mchog tu 'dod// phyi nang thun mong shes par bya// rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus// tshar bcad pa'ang/ 
35a8(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// dgug dang bskrad dang bsad pa dang // mnan dang bsreg par shes par bya// rgyun nam dus chen bzhi gsum gnyis// chung ngu rgyun nam chen po ni// bcu gnyis bzhi'am 
35b1(rgyud 'grel): tha ma gcig/ rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag lnga// 'bru dang shing thog sman rnams dang // chan thug khur la sogs pa yi// rdzas rnams thams cad 'tshogs par bsags// de stengs dkar gsum 
35b2(rgyud 'grel): klu la shis// khrag ste snying sna sha sna gsum// de sogs thun rdzas tshar bcad do// bskyed rim tshul du bya ba dang // bla ma nas bzung bsrung byas la// cho ga gsum du bskyed pa'am// chung ngu 
35b3(rgyud 'grel): skad cig lhar bskyed la// mtshan dang ldan pa'i pad+ma ru// rdzas rnams kun gyis bkang nas ni// steng du rdo rje sngon po bsam// khong seng can la hUM gis mtshan// mtho gang la ni pi bong can// 
35b4(rgyud 'grel): de la bcu drug bdun pas mtshan// rdo rje mtshan ldan par du ni// sdud sbyongs 'phro ba'i mthing dmar dkar// pad 'og ye shes lnga ldan gsum// bru gsum 'og na zla ga ma can// thugs kyi 
35b5(rgyud 'grel): mthing gnag 'phros pa las// rdo rje lte bskul mtha' gnyis bskyod// dmar po 'bar bas mtshan ldan dros// thugs kyis bsdus shing gsung gis sbyangs// sku la 'phros pas ri bong bskul// 
35b6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab can la 'od zer 'phros// de yis yab yum bskul nas ni// kha dog dkar po'i bdud rtsi bab// dang po bskul byed 'od du zhu// khong seng can nas pad+mar babs// babs pa'i rting
35b7(rgyud 'grel): la de nyid lhung // lan gsum bskor nas 'o ma bzhin// lnga pa'i dang po lnga pas mtshan// de yis gdan bskyed 'khor bcas bskyed// ji hUM rdo rje khong seng can// bdud rtsi gsol bas mnyes par
35b8(rgyud 'grel): bsam// yang na lha mo dkar mo yis// mtshan ldan gyis ni bkang nas mchod// bstod nas bshags shing las bcol lo// de yang rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus// de ltar byas nas 
36a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol// yang na skad cig lhar bskyed la// thugs kha'i hUM gis bdud rtsi sbyangs// slar yang ye shes bdud rtsi dbab// yud tsam sprul pa lha yis gsol/ 
36a2(rgyud 'grel): yud tsam mos pas gsum ka gsal// shin tu bsdus pas zas de bzhin// pan gdags pa'i sbyor ka ste dngo po'o// // dgrag pa'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ni// thun mdo cho ga thams cad ni/ 
36a3(rgyud 'grel): thun mong gtor ma dag dang mthun// khyad par gtor mi bstan pa ni// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu// shin tu dmar pa'i gos gyon la// nub kyi phyogs su 'baltas te// cho ga gsum 
36a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis lhar bskyed pa'am// cho ga rnam lngas lhar bskyed pa// gang yang rung bas byas la byin gyis brlab// gtor ma'i rdzas ni thun mong rdzas steng du// khyad par rdzas ni raka ta sna tshogs dang // 
36a5(rgyud 'grel): gshog pa can gyis sha sna sna tshogs shis// byin gyis brlabs la bde gshegs mchod// gnyis pa mkha' 'gro ma la mchod// gsum pa chos skyong rnams la mchod// bzhi pa 'byung po thams 
36a6(rgyud 'grel): cad tshim par bya// yang na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis su mchod par bya'o// sngags ni rtsa ba'i sngags la ba laM kha kha lA hi khA hi zhes lan gsum mam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas 
36a7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni b+hU ta DA ki ni/ badz+ra DA ki ni/ rAt+na DA ki ni/ pad+ma r+tha ki niHbi shwa DA ki ni/ sA ya DA ki niHsarba thA ki niHi maM ba liM ta kha kha/ khA hi Sh+Tha haM/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal mgon po 
36a8(rgyud 'grel): nag po ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gtso bo yin pas// rtsa ba'i sngags la bdags te dbul// 'jig rten pa'i mgon po nag po ni phyogs skyong gi gtso bo yin pas sngags kyang gong bzhin shes par bya/ 
36b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi sngags ni/ in+d+ra zhes bya ba las kyi tshogs dang mthun// 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags ni oM A ro mu khaM zhes bya ba la sogs pas bya'o// de nas bstod pa bya zhing 
36b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las bcol// 'od zer 'phros pas thal mo brdab// des su thams cad bskal nas ni// gang la bya ba dgug par bsam// de 'dra lan grangs brgyanas stong // khri nas 'bum 
36b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis khugs par 'gyur// dgug pa'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka skye gnyis pa'o// // bskrad pa'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ni// thun mong cho ga thams cad ni// thun mong gtor ma dag dang mthun/ 
36b4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gtor ma phal cher yang // bskrad pa'i tshogs kyi sbyor kar blta// man ngag khyad par bstan pa ni// shing lo'am grog dag la ni// rlung dang bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris la// 'od 
36b5(rgyud 'grel): zer rlung gis bskyod pa dang // khro bo dag gis bskyod pa dang // rlung lha dag la bskyod nas ni// nam mkha' mtha' gtugs bskyal bar bya// bskrad pa'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ste gsum pa'o// / 
36b6(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa khro bos bsad pa dang // mtshon tshwa'i char sogs dbab pas bsad// sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas sogs gzhan// mkhas pas man ngag sbyor bar bya'o// bsad pa'i sbyor ka ste 
36b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'o// // mnan pa'ang gong ma bzhin te mthur// khyad par ri rab 'bum dang ni// rdo rje dang ni khro bo yang // 'bum du byas te 'od zer sogs// sbyor ba gzhan yang man ngag bzhin// 
36b8(rgyud 'grel): mnan pa'i sbyor ka ste lnga pa'o// // bsreg pa sku gsung thugs kyis bsreg/ yang na me la sogs pa yi// sbyor ba gzhan du shes par bya'o// sreg pa'i sbyor ka ste drug pa'o// / 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa yis ni sbyor ba yang // sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// lu gu rgyud dang zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog la sogs sbyor ba yis// mkhas pa yis ni bcings/ 
37a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// bcings pa'i sbyor ka ste bdun pa'o// // klu dang rgyal po gnyis las ni// khyad par gtor ma bstan pa ni// dngul dang 'khar ba shi ngo dor dang // sa dkar snod du bya bar shis// 
37a3(rgyud 'grel): sman lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu la shis// rin chen snod ni mdzes pa ru// rin chen lnga dang 'bru sna lnga// dar zab shing rtogs la sogs pa// rgyal po nyid la shis par 
37a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// de gnyis byin gyis brlab pa yang // rdzas kyi steng du hrIH'am hUM// de'i 'od kyis rdzas rnams bsreg/ skyon dag nas ni bdud rtsir bsam// de nas lag pa g.yas pa ni// mchog 
37a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin byas pa'i lag mthil du// brim las dpag bsam shing bsam ste// de yi yal ga'i gseb tu ni// si las bdud rtsi bum pa bsam// de yis bdud rtsi yi ni rgyun// lag mthil du ni 
37a6(rgyud 'grel): babs nas kyang // gtor ma'i nang du 'dres par bsam// de nas oM aHhUM lan gsum bzlas// de nas rang gi mdun du pad+ma bzhi bsam// de nas rang gi snying ga'i hUM gi 'od kyis// klu thams 
37a7(rgyud 'grel): cad ni pad+mar bkug/ 'od zer 'phros pas sbyangs sogs bya// thams cad 'od du zhu ba las// bde gshegs klu'i sprul pa 'am// gsung gi rigs kyi lha ru gyur// de nas/ spyan drangs bstim 
37a8(rgyud 'grel): zhing dbang bskur bya// de nas rdo rje rtse lnga sbu gu can du bsams la// de nas spyan drangs la gsol bar bsam// bstab pa'i sngags ni/ oM bA su gi ba li ta khA hi zhes klu rnams kyis so so'i rtsa 
37b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags la btags la dbral bar bya'o// gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags ni badz+ra muHzhes btags la gshegs su gsol// rgyal po yang sprul pa dang las kyi rigs su bsam// phyi ma 
37b2(rgyud 'grel): mthun te man ngag tu shes par bya'o// klu dang rgyal po'i sbyor ka ste brgyad pa'o// // de dag thams cad phyi yin no// nang gi snying ga'i lha rnams la// gtor ma zas rnams yin pas na// / 
37b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs nas ni// lha la ting nge 'dzin gyis dbul// de ni rnal 'byor lam pa yin// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i man ngag bzhin// nang gi gtor ma'i sbyor ka ste dgu pa'o// 
37b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i gtor ma'i sbyor kA ni// lte ba pad+ma gtor ma'i snod// de steng zla ba'i steng du ni// byang chub sems kyi kun de la// bdud rtsi la sogs yon tan sogs// gtor ma'i rdzas su bstan 
37b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// de 'og tsaN+Da li yi me// de 'og rlung sngon bskyod pa las// me 'bar bdud rtsi zhu ste phab// 'khor lo mkha' 'gro rnams la mchod// rtog pa zhi ba las rnams 'grub// gsang ba'i 
37b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i sbyor ka sde bcu pa'o// // bla na med pa'i gtor ma ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la// thams cad rdzogs pa'i man ngag 'chang // bla na med pa'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ste bcu 
37b7(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa'o// // gtor ma'i man ngag sbyor ka rnams// man ngag rim par bkod pa yis// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// bla med byang chub thob par shog/ slob 
37b8(rgyud 'grel): dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // tshogs kyi la ma'i chog bzhugs// @#// rgya gar skad du/ gaN tsakra bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga 
38a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// tshogs cher khyad par bsags pa dang // dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba dang // sgrib sbyang mchog ni thob bya'i phyir// rnal 'byor/ 
38a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs mthun bdag gis bshad// tshogs ni gnyis su shes par bya'o// phan gdags pa dang tshar bcad pa'i// de yang 'khor lo bskor dang mchod pa brtsam// phan pa mchog dang
38a3(rgyud 'grel): thun mong ngo // dgug dang bskrad dang mnan pa dang // bsad pa la sogs tshar bcad pa'o// de sbab rnal 'byor bstan pa ni// sngags pa gcig tu rtog byed dang // dus rnams kun tu rtse/ 
38a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig ldar// rgyud rnams kyi ni snying po shes// de nyid bcu ni mchog du rig/ zab cing rgya che chos la mos// yid ni shin tu 'jam pa dang // bsnyen bskur ldan zhing 'jigs pa med//

38b2(rgyud 'grel): lho la gsum pa shar// de yi thun mong khyad par ni// dang po sa 'og phyi ma ste// rim gsum gyen du brtsigs pa ni// lus 'dod pa'am phyi ma'i lugs// pan 'dogs don tu bstan pa'o// / 
38b3(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod mcho gling 'jigs pa'i gnas// 'di 'dra'i rigs mthun la sogs su// tshar bcad don du gong bzhin bya// dus ni rgyun nam lo 'am zla// khyad par bzhi gsum gnyis dang gcig/ 
38b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis bzhi ru dam tshig go/ de ltar ma byas mkha' 'gros gsod// byas na dngos grub chen po thob// yon tan sbyor ba'i rim pa dang // sgrub po 'dod pa'i rim pa yis// gong gi khyad par/ 
38b5(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// phyi ltar ba yi rnam lngas byug/ nang ni bdud rtsi rnam lngas byug/ phyi ni mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams bris// nang ni dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// dkyil 'khor gsang cho ga nub mor bri/

38b7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mdun du 'khon gcugs sbyangs// las kyi sems dpa' gral la dgod// rgyan chagon la go gor gnas// slob dpon gyis ni byin brlabs shing // las kyi sems mas rtags gsum 
38b8(rgyud 'grel): gdab// rang gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal bya// karma sa baN+Dal mchod pa rnams// rim par byas nas gsol ba gdab// bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin bsgom// so so'i lha'i nga rgyal bya//

39b4(rgyud 'grel): glu blangs rol mo brdung // mchod cing bstod nas mthol bshags bya// 'phrin las bcol la gshegs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshogs kyi sbyor ka'i

39b7(rgyud 'grel): rim sum rim ni// mu stegs nyan thos skyes pa yi// sgra 'gyur log spyod spyad byed gsum// de dag spang phyir gong bzhin bstan// rgyal rigs rje rigs bram ze'i rigs// bu mo mtshan 
39b8(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa ni// mtshan rnams bcu po rdzogs pa dang // shes rab che dang snying rje che// dad pa la sogs che ba dang // rnal 'byor ldan zhing phyag rgya mkhas// sbyor thabs kun la rab tu 
40a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhas// de lta'i rnal 'byor nyung yang lnga// mang bar gyur na rnam 'byor kyang // bskyed de de ltar rig par spyad// lnga gnyis zung du gnas pa las/ 
40a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i rim pa mthar phyin pas// nang gi mchod pa brtsam par bya// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brtsam// gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis// dga' ba'i ye shes bcu drug ni// 
40a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i tshul las lhan cig bskyed// ye shes 'khor lo zhes su grags// yang na sprul pa'i 'khor lo la// thig le phra mo bsam pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yin rtsa rnams mo// rlung ni las/ 
40a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems pa yis// de la sogs pa'i man ngag rnams// slob dpon zhal las shes par bya// 'khor lo gsum la'ang de bzhin no// tshogs zhes bya ba mang ba yin// 'khor lo zhes bya 
40a5(rgyud 'grel): bskor du btub// mchog ces bya ba lhan cig gda'// de ltar mchog gi 'khor lo ni// yang yang sbyang zhing bsgom par bya// mchog gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o// 
40a6(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// thun mong cho ga thams cad ni// thun mong tshogs 'khor dang mthun no// khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dgra thu// shin tu dmar 
40a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gos gyon nas// nub phyogs su ni kha bltas te// cho ga gsum gyis lcang bskyed nas// 'khor bskyed pa'ang mi bskyed pa'o// bskyed pa hUM gis bskyed pa dang // mi bskyed skad cig
40a8(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'o// ye shes dkyi 'khor sbyin drangs sogs// byas nas bskyed rim mther phyin nas// mdun gyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa la/ cho ga la sogs rdzogs byas nas// dur khrod ras 
40b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dag la ni// mdun du gzugs sam 'khor lo bri// dgrag pa'i yi ge'i 'od zer gyis// bsgrub bya bkug nas bstim par bya// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dkyil 'khor bzhi 
40b2(rgyud 'grel): po de dag la// mchod bstod la sogs byas nas ni// 'phrin las bcol zhing rbad pa dang // sngags bzlas brgya rtsa brgyad du ni// rab kyis bya ba 'bring gi ni// lnga brgya tha ma stong gis so// 
40b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po rab tu re re yang // de bzhin cig gis 'grub pa dang // yang na thun par bzhi dag tu// rtse gcig lnga bcu brgya rtsa brgyad// de lta'i 'khor lo rtsa gcig dang // lnga bcu brgya rtsa brgyad du ni// 
40b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub po khyad par rab 'bring gis// bsgrub bya gang yin khugs par bsam// nyi shu rtsa drug mtha' las ni// bsgrub bya'i ming ni bcug nas su// 'gugs byed bsre bar gzhug par bya// dgug 
40b5(rgyud 'grel): bai tshogs kyi sbyor ka la// nyin dang mtshan du brtson par bya// dgug pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste gsum pa'o// // bskrad pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// thun mong cho ga thams cad ni// 
40b6(rgyud 'grel): phan gdags pa ni nyid dang mthun// khyad par 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu// lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te// sngon po la sogs gos gon la// bskyed rim tshul du bya ba dang // cho ga gsum 
40b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis bya ba yin// de nas ye shes spyan drangs nas// cho ga la sogs rdzogs par bya// mdun du dur khrod ras ma la// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// de snyed zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// 
40b8(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bris nas ni// rnal 'byor ci 'dod mdun du bsam// yang na gtso bo lnga 'am drag po gnyis// las la med du mi rung ngo // gtso bo drag po las ni bsdus/ 
41a1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gnyis po shin tu bsdus// dkyil 'khor gsum po sprul pa las// cho ga la sogs rdzogs par bya// tshogs kyi rdzas rnams ma lus bsag/ khyud 
41a2(rgyud 'grel): par tsit+ta sna tshogs dang // sha sna khrag snga la sogs pa'i// tshul khrims bsrung ldan nas bzung nas// sgo mangs can ni yan chod kyi// rang gi sbyor ba ma byas par// gzhan la nyos 
41a3(rgyud 'grel): dang blangs pa yis// rdzas rnams rdo rje can gyis ni// rgud las bsngags par bcom ldan gsungs// byan pos btso bsreg byas nas ni// yon bdag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// 
41a4(rgyud 'grel): skor ba bdun nam gsum byas la// 'bying bag 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni// slob dpon la ni rdo rje'i glus// phyag rgya bskur nas drang bar bya// hUM bla ma rdo rje slob dpon ni// gnyis 
41a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mthu ldan pas// dbyings las ma g.yos rtogs med kyang // sems can gdul bya'i don slad du// rdo rje can gyi sku sprul nas// rtse gcig ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 
41a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgya chen 'di// bdag gzhan lha rnams mchod pa yis// byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad du gsol// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// yi ge gsum gyi bdud rtsi yis/ 
41a7(rgyud 'grel): bsreg sbyabs bdud rtsi zhu nas kyang // bde gshegs mchod bstod rdzogs byas nas// 'phrin las bcol bas khro bo yi// sngags bzlas pas ni bsgrub bya ste// 'khor lo rlung gi 
41a8(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la// sgrub bya de ru bzhag nas su// khro bo dpag med spros pa yis// zhal nas rlung nag tshub ma ni// btang bas sgrub bya btig nas kyang // nub byang mtshams kyis rlung 
41b1(rgyud 'grel): lhas ni// khyad par de nyid bskyod nas kyang // nam mkha' mthas gtugs sa ru bskyal// de ltar lan gsum lhag sum gyis// cho ga byas te bskyal bar bya// bskrad pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor 
41b2(rgyud 'grel): lo'i sbyor ka ste bzhi pa'o// // mnan pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// thun mong cho ga thams cad ni// phan gdags pa ni nyid dang mthun// khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni// ri bo dben pa'i
41b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas dag tu// slob dpon lho phyogs kha bltas te// ser nag la sogs rgyan cha gon// cho ga la sogs rdzogs byas la// rnal 'byor rnams kyi mdun du ni// dur khrod ras ma dag la ni// 
41b4(rgyud 'grel): ba bla 'am ldong ros khu bas su// gser gyi ri rab bris nas kyang // de 'og mthing shing dag gis ni// rgya mtsho chen po'i gzugs bris la// de gnyis dag gi bar du ni// bsgrub bya'i ming // 
41b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams bris nas kyang // shugs ldan pa dang mgo 'chos dang // kun tu rgyug pa yan chod kyi// sna gsum po ni thams cad kun// chos mthun spyod pas btsal nas kyang // byin po de rdzogs 
41b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzas rnams la// yid 'ong dpag med bshams nas kyang // bskor nas slob dpon la phul bas// cho ga la sogs rdzogs nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga yis// sngags bzlas
41b7(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa brgyad pa gnyis// ting 'dzin ldan pas bslab bya ste// ming gi yi ge bskyed nas kyang // yi ge gnyis po ri rab dang // rgya mtsho bskyed nas mnan par bya// dkyil 'khor mtha' ma'i 
41b8(rgyud 'grel): cho ga yis// khang pa'i phyi rol dag tu ni// drag po'i 'brub khung byas nas kyang // nag pos kha ni bcad nas kyang // de steng las kyi rgya gram bri// de sogs cho ga'i sbyor bas su// mkha' 'gro/ 
42a1(rgyud 'grel): / rnams kyis mnan par bya'o// mnan pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste lnga ba'o// // bsad pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// thun mong chog thams cad ni// pan 
42a2(rgyud 'grel): gdags pa dang mthun par bsam// khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni// drar khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas rab tu// slob dpon lho phyogs kha bltas te// mnan cing drag po rgyan chagon// rnal 'byor 
42a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi mdud du ni// dur khrod ras la gzugs bris la// brang bu gri gug mtshon cha rnams// khro bo'i sngags kyis byin brlabs nas// phur bu gdab cing gri yis gtub// thun mong 
42a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzas rnams steng du ni// gdod pa can ni sna tshogs kyi// gsum dang ldan pa yid du 'ong // slob dpon la ni phul nas kyang // dang po bsgrub bya de nyid la// bkug nas khro bo'i mtshon cha 
42a5(rgyud 'grel): yis// bsad pa'i cho ga byas nas su// rtsa gcig la sogs sngags kyis ni// de bzhin byin rlabs byas nas su// dang po 'khor lo mchod nas kyang // cho ga la sogs rdzogs byas 
42a6(rgyud 'grel): la// slar yang bsgrub bya bkug nas ni// mdun bsam bsad pa'i sbyor ba yis// cho ga rdzogs nas tha ma ni// mkha' 'gro ma yis bsad pa yi// sbyor bas cho ga rdzogs par bya'o// 
42a7(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste drug pa'o// // bsreg pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka nI// cho ga thams cad gzhan dang mthun// dkyil 'khor gsum du sbyin 
42a8(rgyud 'grel): sreg gsum// rnal 'byor pa ni thams cad kyis// sngags la sogs pa'i 'khor lo yis// bskor ba'i tshul du tha ma ni// las mkhan gyis ni bsreg par bya'o// de yi tshig 
42b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni// sbyin sreg cho gar shes par bya'o// bsreg pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste bdun pa'o// // bsgrub pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// cho ga thams cad gzhan dang 
42b2(rgyud 'grel): mthun// khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni// rnam par bam pa ma yin pa'i// mtshan ldan bam chen blangs nas ni// ming gi yi ge bskyed nas kyang // de nyid dkyil 'khor gsum po la// 
42b3(rgyud 'grel): bstab ste yang na rdzas la ni// bsams te byin brlabs byas nas kyang // karma byug sngon na mgrin gyis// lan gsum lan bdun nyi shu gcig/ bstab pa'i tsho gas ni mkhas pas/ 
42b4(rgyud 'grel): so// de nas phyi rol dag tu bya// de ltar gnyis bstab gsum du bstab// slob dpon man ngag shes par bya'o// bstab pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka sde brgyad pa'o// // thun 
42b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum thun bzhi dag tu ni// nyin dang mtshan ni lan gsum du// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka la// rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya'o// dngos grub rnam gnyis 'dod pa dang // 
42b6(rgyud 'grel): bar chad rnam gnyis bsal ba'i phyir// tshegs kyi 'khor lo 'di byas dge bas su// thams cad byang chub thob par shog/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa 
42b7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// // lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// // @// lag na rdo rje sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs// @#// rgya gar skad du/ hau tr-i bi d+hi 
42b8(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// sdig pa gzhi la dang bsod nams 'phel// dgug dang dbang byed bsad pa'i sa// sgrub po rnams la phan btag 
43a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir// bdag gi sbyin sreg bshad par bya// dang po bkra shis gnas dag tu// brtag sogs bsdus rgyas rnam gsum bya// 'bring ni rang nyid gos sngon gyi// ting 'dzin 
43a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas bka' sgo zhing // shar du kho bltas 'byung po la// yid dang mthun pa'i gtor ma sbyin// yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'am// hUM gis yang ni sbyang bar bya// rdo rje phyag rgya de bzhin shes// 
43a3(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i yi ges skyon spangs shing // sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang ba'o// de ni rgyas pa'i rtags sogs 'dod// 'bring ni sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang // me tog tshom bu grangs mnyam pa/ 
43a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhung bzhin bris pa rdzogs par 'dod// mtha' ma mdzes pa'i snod dag la// yig 'bru gsum gyis byin brlabs nas// ting 'dzin sbyang ba kho nar 'dod// sa skyon sbyang ba gsum zhes
43a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// thab brtsig rgyar ni khru gang la// zabs su khru phyed zlum pos bskor// sor bzhi gsum ni dor byas la// rdo rje dbus su brgyad pa'i tshad// thab khung dkar po rgyab tu me ri'o// steng du/ 
43a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phyi rol 'od zer dkar// bud shing dkar po khru gang tshad// tsan+dan dkar po 'o mas spangs te bzhag/ mchod sbyin shing ni mdzub gang tshad// 'dab ma dang bcas rtse mo'i ngos// sngar
43a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sbyangs pas yam shing bya// dkar gsum mngar gsum mar gyi 'og/ 'bras chan 'bru ni sna tshogs dang // ku sha yon chab g.yas su bzhag/ me tog la sogs bsang gtor dang // 
43a8(rgyud 'grel): zhal ba sil rnams ni g.yon du bzhag/ dgang gzar dang ni thugs gzar gnyis// mtshan nyid rgyas par gzhan du bstan// yang na g.yas kyi sor mo bskum pa las// yi ge hUM gi 'od zer 
43b1(rgyud 'grel): de yis ni// rdo rje can gyi 'od zer bkug pa yis// rdul shig ye shes gong bu las// rdo rje khro bo'i dgang gzar gyur// g.yon gyi mthe bos mthe chung mnan// gong bzhin sbyangs nas 
43b2(rgyud 'grel): blugs gzar gyur// de nyid rdo rje dril ni mdun// de nas dkar po'i rgyan cha bgo/ yid dang mthun pa ku sha'i steng // sems pa'i skyil krung shar du bltas// thab sogs tsan+dan tshus gtor 
43b3(rgyud 'grel): to// bud shing ma nor zlum por brtsig/ de na sardza ni ku sha la// oM a mri ta kuN+Da li sarba big+h+nA nA sha ya hUM phaT/ las kyi sngags kyis bsad gtor bya// bum sbyangs bskyed dgug bzlas 
43b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// rtsa gcig bdun gyis 'od zer dgang // thabs kyi kho ra khor yug la// ku sha'i rtse mo phyi ru bstan// de nas lha yi rnal 'byor ni// cho ga lnga'amachog gsum// skad cig bsdus 
43b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas shes par bya// zab la sogs pa'i man ngag kyang // las kyi tshogs su shes par bya// de yang slob dpon man ngag gtso// bram ze'i khyim ma me gtsub shing mes// rlung g.yab kyis 
43b6(rgyud 'grel): sbar las kyis bsang // sbyang zhing bskyed nas raM dkar pos// me lnga dkar po drang srong zhi ba'i tshul// tshangs pa'i skud pa dkar por ldan// phyag nas dbyug pa bgrang phreng dang // gud+d+he skyab 
43b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bsdams pa'o// 'od 'phros sngar bzhin spyan drangs te// oM ba pa ka a ga na ye/ A gats+tsha ya/ A gats+tsha ya/ ma ma shA n+ting ku ru swA hA// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings te spyan drang ngo // 
43b8(rgyud 'grel): bi gegs bskrad bstim ste mchod pa dbul// rtsa sngags nyid la mchod sngags btags te dbul// oM ba pa ka ag+na ye// che ge mo shAn+ti d+haru swA hA// zhes sreg rdzas dbul bar bya 
44a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi man ngag 'od zer ni// sum skor du ni bya ba dang // nyis skor du ni bya ba dang // bdag nyid rab tu shes par bya// bzhi skor dag dang slob ma'o// 'od zer dgang 
44a2(rgyud 'grel): bo 'phros pa las// thugs dang snying ga rgyud pa dang // gsung nas ngag la brgyud pa dang // dbu nas mgo la brgyud pa yi// lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa sbyang // rtsa ba gsum 'dus 
44a3(rgyud 'grel): bskang bar bya// spyi bo gtsug nas brtsams nas ni// sdig dang srin bu zad pa'i phyir// dmar pos sreg cing dkar pos bkru// sgo dgu dag nas bsdu ba dang // thams cad kun na 
44a4(rgyud 'grel): bsdu ba dang // snying gar bsdus nas dbyung ba dang // til gyis gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// sdig pa'i gzugs la de gzhug bya// rdzas rnams bdud rtsis mchod pas ni/ 
44a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas sdig pa de ba sreg bya// yang na rdzas la bstim ste bsreg/ nad rnams zhi bar byed pa ni// nad kyi ming nas smos nas ni// gong ma de bzhin bsregs pa'am// nad kyi ming 
44a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gzugs bris la// 'od zer dmar pos bsregs nas ni// dkar pos sbyang zhing zhi bsams la// 'byung ba'i dgra rnams de bzhin bsam// 'byung po kun dang dgra kun yang / 
44a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer bkye bas zhi bar bsam// gzugs dang ming bris zhi bar bya// sreg rjes bdud rtsi 'od kyis mchod// mchod pas mnyes pas gong bzhin bskor// de lta min na 'og 
44a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// man ngag de la nan tan bya// mar dang dkar gsum mngar gsum dang // yim shing mar 'og chan dang nas// de la sogs pa'i thun rdzas rnams// rim pa bzhin du 
44b1(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya// til ni med du mi rung ngo // za ma gang thugs mthol bshags bya// bstod cing phrin las bcol bar bya// thugs ka nyid du pho brang bca'// skad cig de gsal 
44b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dbyug/ bstim la mchod pa rnam lnga bya// rtsa sngags bachod sngags btags te dpral// sreg rdzas kun kyang de bzhin bya// man dag rim pa 'dir shes bya// slob dpon 
44b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal las shes par bya// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad ni bsdus rgyas pa'o// rtsa lnga lnga bcu brgya yis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa zhi bar 'gyur// sdig pa che bar 
44b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas ni// nyis 'gyur gsum ni brgyad brgya'o// shin tu che gyur stong gi bar// de yi sdig dang bsod nams ni// che chung rab 'bring shes par bya'o// de ltar byas na nges par zhi// 
44b5(rgyud 'grel): the ma dgang blugs mthol bshags bya// bstod cing las bcol gshegs su gsol// ting 'dzin bsdus nas me lhag mas// mchod nas sred rdzas gong bzhin dbul// dgang 
44b6(rgyud 'grel): blugs la sogs rdzogs byas la// ting 'dzin bsdus te spyod lam bya// thun gsum sbyor ka sbyin sreg la// rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya// sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka slob dpon skabs/ 
44b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya ba ni// maN+Dal kha dog ser po la// khru do khru phyed zhu gang du// bskor te gru bzhi 'am zur brgyad du// byas nas song gnyis sor 
44b8(rgyud 'grel): bzhi can// dbus su rin chen 'bar bse mtshan// bar du me ri'i kha khyer steng // rin chen rdo rjes bskor bar bri// ser po'i rgyan chas bgos nas ni// byang phyogs ngos su kha 
45a1(rgyud 'grel): bltas la// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul bsgoms nas// las kyi bum pa sbyang sogs bya'o// 'bras bu 'o ma can gyi shing // kha dog ser po dbus kyi cha/ 
45a2(rgyud 'grel): thab khung dbus su bcer bar bya// khru gang khru phyed mdzub gang du// dri zhim spangs pa yam shing byo// las kyi bum pas bsangs nas ni// mchod rdzas ser po la sogs rnams// 
45a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du mar sar zhol sogs// me sar brtag cing thab khung sbyang // thab bskyed me lha bskyed pa ni// sde tshan drug pa'i gsum pa dang // gnyis pa lnga yi dang po ni// bskyed pa la ni 
45a4(rgyud 'grel): bsngags par gsungs// me lha ser po zhal gcig ni// phyag bzhi phyag gnyis dbang chen kun// spyan drangs bstims te dbang bskur ro// mchod pa la sogs byas nas ni// 
45a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas sreg rdzas rnams ni dbul// rtsa sngags nyid la mtha' bzhi ru// gzar bu rin chen rdo rjes bya'o// rgyas par bstan pa zhi dang mthun// man ngag gnyis skor la sogs kyang // zhi dang 
45a6(rgyud 'grel): mthun te khyad par ni// 'od zer sna bug zhugs nas ni// snying ga dag tu phyin nas ni// lus kun rtsa yi rlung rnams dang // byang chub sems ni gsal zhing rgyas// yang na 'od zer lus kun 
45a7(rgyud 'grel): la// khyab pas tshe dang bsod nams dang // stobs rnams gang 'dod rgyas par 'gyur// tha ma dgang blugs bstod pa bya// de ni 'bar ba'i rnam pa'am// thugs ka nyid du gos sngon car// 
45a8(rgyud 'grel): bskyed nas spyan drangs bstim byas la// dbang bskur mchod pa la sogs bya// dgang blugs bstod nas bshags pa bya// ye shes gshegs nas ting 'dzin bsdu// yi ge bcu 
45b1(rgyud 'grel): bdun mtha' bsgyur la// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te bya// me lha rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni// cho ga la sogs gong bzhin bya// nyi shu rtsa gcig nas bzung 
45b2(rgyud 'grel): nas// stong gi bar du tshun chad du// sbyor ba gnyis po gang byas kyang // ji ltar 'dod pa rgyas par 'gyur// thun gsum sbyin sreg sbyor ka las// rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par
45b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o// // slob dpon b+habs mdzad pa rdzogs so// // dbang gi sbyin sreg sbyor ka ni// sa gzhi dmar ba'i thab khung du// b+ha ga lta bu 'am 
45b4(rgyud 'grel): zla ga ma bya// tshad ni rgyas pa'i chung 'bring ngo // kha khyer mu ran gnyis dang bzhi// gri gug gam gzhu ni dbus su mtshan// pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad la'o// bud shing dmar po tsher ma'i shing // 
45b5(rgyud 'grel): yam shing sor ni bcu gnyis sam// sor brgyad tshad la dri mar bsku// mchod rdzas dmar po g.yas su bzhag/ mar la sogs pa'i bsreg rdzas ni// dmar po'i ro dang dris bsgyur nas// 
45b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du bzhag nas stan dmar po// rol pa'i 'dug stangs nub phyogs blta// dmar po la sogs rgyan chas bgo// bud shing bcer te bcang bar bya// bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bsgoms// 
45b7(rgyud 'grel): nas// me sbar la sogs cho ga bya// rlung gi yi ge bsngags pa yin// kha dog dmar po rlung la gnas// spyan drangs bstims te dbang bskur ro// mchod pa la sogs dbul ba ni// me lha'i 
45b8(rgyud 'grel): bsngags la mtha' bsgyur la// cho ga la sogs rdzogs nas ni// me lha'i thugs kar lha bskyed nas// spyan drangs la sogs cho ga bya// 'od zer dmar po 'phros nas ni// lha mnyes 
46a1(rgyud 'grel): pas ni dgug par bsam// yang na man dag sbyor ba gsum// ba ma me yi chog ni// me lnga'i sngags kyis gsum mam bdud// lnga ni ni shu rtsa brgyad bsngag 
46a2(rgyud 'grel): bdun napa brgya yi bar du bya// de ltar sbyin sreg sbyor ka la// nyin mtshan du ni brtson par bya'o// slob dpon b+hA bas mdzad pa dbang gi sbyin sreg gi sbyor ba ste gsum pa rdzogs so 
46a3(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa'i sbyin sreg sbyor ka ni// thab khung grub gsum kha dog gnag/ rdo rje gri gug nang dang steng // bar du me ri rtse mo 'phags// bdud rtsi la sogs chen rtsi shug/ bud shing nag 
46a4(rgyud 'grel): tsher ma can// ye shing de mthun bcu gnyis tshad// mchod rdzas la sogs nag po shis// tshil chen mar nag la sogs pa'i// byed par gdod pa can gyi sha/ nad las 
46a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sreg rdzas shis// nam phyed nyid phyed dus dag tu// sa gzhi mtho ba'i sngar dag la// brkyang bskum la sogs rgyan cha rdzogs// bskyed rim tshul du byas nas ni// me spar la 
46a6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bya// me lha gang 'dod bskyed nas ni// ye shes spyar drangs mchod sogs dbul// rnal 'byor sbyor ka'i man ngag ni// 'di ni shin tu zab ces pas// gzu lums rdo/ 
46a7(rgyud 'grel): dgag pa'i phyir// slob dpon zhal las shes par bya'o// lha yi cho ga rdzogs nas ni// me lha gsang ste ting 'dzin bsdu// rdzas rnams thams cad bsdus nas ni// cho ga 
46a8(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs bya'o// drag po las kyi sbyor ka ste bzhi pa rdzogs so// // bsdus pa las kyi sbyor ka ni// thun mong cho ga thams cad ni// gong ma bzhin du shes byas la// ban 
46a9(rgyud 'grel): gtag sa ma ya ra thamams mams da mar bab ma ma pa sa ma sa ma yang pa la bam 
46b1(rgyud 'grel): bru ba ma nus pas// maN+Dal bdud rtsis byugs nas su// tshon rnams kyis ni bri bar bya// de nas cho ga rdzogs bya'o// shin tu bsdus pa'i sbyor ka ni// maN+Dal byas la me tog
46b2(rgyud 'grel): dgram// skad cig lhar bskyed byin brlabs la// bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni// cho ga la sogs rdzogs bya'o// khyad par zhi ba dag le ni// dngul dang 'khar ba dag ni
46b3(rgyud 'grel): shis pa ste// rgyas pa gser dang ra gan dang // dbang ni zangs la drag po lcags// khyi yi thod pa'ang bya bar gsungs// dbyibs rnams so sor byas pa'am// yang na bsam 
46b4(rgyud 'grel): te byas pa'o// de rnams rnyed par ma gyur na// sa ni rin chen dang 'dra bas// kham por snod rnams kun la ni// so so'i dbyibs ni byas pa dang // bsams te byin gyis brlabs// 
46b5(rgyud 'grel): byas la// cho ga la sogs rdzogs bya'o// sbyin sreg las kyi sbyor ka rnams// rna bar brgud pa'i rim pa yis// rgyud la gab pa'i don rnams kun// bdag gis sgrub pa po la 
46b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan// 'di bstan pa yi dge bas ni// thams cad byang chub thob par shog/ sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga/ slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// mug na rdo 
46b7(rgyud 'grel): can gyi sbyin meg gi tshig bzhugs/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra pA ti nI laM bar d+ha ra~M ho tri bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ dpal gos 
46b8(rgyud 'grel): sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo// man ngag rim pa dran tsam zhig/ slob ma'i don du bshad par bya// sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis// sgrub pa yon dus dag tu// sbyin sreg dag 
46b9(rgyud 'grel): ma gas sa ma ma mapar ra ba gam ga ma ma ma ma mas ma ra sa ma ma pa bag 
47a1(rgyud 'grel): gis bsad par bya// sa bzhag blang zhing snang ba dang // byin gyis brlab cing bsrung ba dang // snying pa dag tu bu mi dgos// maN+Dal gru gsum lho phyogs bsnun/ 
47a2(rgyud 'grel): khru gang chad la byed brkos na// gsum dor gsum ni kha khyer ro// bdud rtsi la sogs tshon rtsis nAg por bya// de dbus rdo rje steng yang de// bar du me je rtse mo 'phags// bud shing 
47a3(rgyud 'grel): gnag cing gdug pa'i shing // thab kyi tshad las sor mtho tsam// yam shing de mthun bcu gnyis tshad// mchod rdzas nag po la sogs shis// sreg rdzas mar nag dum khrag 
47a4(rgyud 'grel): ske tshe shabs tshe yungs kar dang // de la sogs pa'i mthun rdzas bya// rdzas de rnams kyis gzugs brnyan bya// mchod rdzas g.yas la sreg rdzas g.yon// byin gyis brlab/ 
47a5(rgyud 'grel): cing bzhag par bya// dgang gzar blugs gzar gzhan dang mthun// yang na lag pa dag gis bya// de gnyis rdo rje dril bu yang // bdun nyid du yang bzhag par bya// las kyi bum 
47a6(rgyud 'grel): pas thams cad bsang // dus ni nam byed zhi byed bya// rgyan cha gon la lho phyogs blta// g.yon brkyang 'dug ste drag tu bzlas// mche ba gtsigs shing khro gnyer bsdu// dang po bskyed 
47a7(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon song nas// me spang brtag cing bgegs bzlog bya// bzang na de ni bya mi dgos// thams sbyang zhing bskyed pa dang // cho ga gsum dang skad cig mas// me lnga nag po khros pa 
47a8(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// ye shes me lha spyan drangs bstim// gnyis su med par rgyas btab la// me lnga'i sngags la mchod sngags bdags de dbul// de nas sreg rdzas dpral bar bya// de dpral 
47b1(rgyud 'grel): ba yi man ngag kyang // khro bo dag gi cho 'phrul gyis// gzugs ba rAn dgug bstim gtubs te dbul// yang na rdzas mchod mnyes pa las// 'od zer khro bos dgug cing bsreg
47b2(rgyud 'grel): man ngag de la nan tan bya// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ag+ne/ che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ stong rtsa brgyad nas brgya rtsa brgyad// nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du'o// yang na bsod nams dag gi rim pa yis/ 
47b3(rgyud 'grel): brgya dang stong dang khri ru bya// de ltar byas pas nges gsod cing // khyad par du ni 'byung po gsod// tha ma da gang blugs bstod bya'o// de yi thugs kar gos sngon bskyed// ye shes 
47b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' sbyar drang bsti pa// rgyas btab mchod bgong bzhin dbul// de nas sreg rdzas rim bzhin dbul// rtse sngags nyid kyis dbul bar bya// gong gi man ngag shes 
47b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya// dgang blugs phul la bstod par bya// phrin las bcol zhing gshegs su gsol// ting 'dzin bsdus te me lnga bsang // rdzas rnams thams cad bsdus nas ni// 
47b6(rgyud 'grel): me yi lA la dbul zhing bstod pa bya// 'phrin las bcol zhing gshegs su gsol// ting 'dzin bsdus te spyod lam bya// slob ma rnams kyi don ched du// bdag gis man 
47b7(rgyud 'grel): ngag 'di bkod pas// slob dang sems can thams cad kyang // gos sngon dngos grub thob par shog/ slob dpon b+habs mdzad pa rdzogs so// // dus bzhi rtsod 
47b8(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyas dus su// sgrub pa po yang mar 'byung zhing // dman la mos pa'ang mang du 'byung // bla ma gus pa'ang dpag tu med// de 'dra'i sems can dpag med kyang // bsdus/ 
48a1(rgyud 'grel): nas gsum du 'dus 'gyur te// sprul dang kha dog rjes 'jug pa'o// rjes 'jug gnyis su shes par bya'o// sbrul la mthun 'jug sbyang ba med// sprul 
48a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'jug ge gang zag la// dam tshig nyams pa mang 'byung yang // nyams pa rnam pa gsum du 'dus// lus ngag yid du shes par bya// lus kyi dam tshig nyams pa
48a3(rgyud 'grel): ni// sA ts+tshas sbyongs te tshogs sbyor ltos// ngag gi nyams pa bzlas pas 'dag/ yid kyi lha yi sbyor kar ltos// thun mong sbyin sreg tshogs gtor rnams// phan 'dogs 
48a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor kar blta bar gyis// nus pa chung ba'i rnal 'byor pas// me bshags maN+Dal gyis sbyang bya// maN+Dal bsnun rnam gnyis te// yid kyis bsams dang dngos byed pa'o// 
48a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos byed skyon spangs gnyen gzhi la// brgya'am lnga bcu nyi shu lnga// lnga'am bsdus pa gcig kyang bya// dbyibs legs mdzes pa bsham par bya// kha dog kun nas sngo yang
48a6(rgyud 'grel): rung // dkar po mthing kha ser dmar bya// yang na yid dang mthun pa'ang rung // tshang ni khru gang yan chad bya// tshon ni dkar rtsi yung ba dang // sngo rtsi kur gum mtshal gyis bya// 
48a7(rgyud 'grel): ba yi rnam lnga bdud rtsi lnga// dum bu gcig par bzhag nas kyang // dri zhim pa yi sman gyis bsgo// bdud rtsi lnga dang thun mong rdzas// gser sogs kha brgyan lnga ldan du// bcug 
48a8(rgyud 'grel): la byin rlabs tshul bzhin bya// rang nyid cho ga gsum gyis bskyed// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags 'dis gdab// ma~M a pri da kuNaT le hUM phaT// byin rlabs bkre shis rdzas dang 
48b1(rgyud 'grel): sreg/ de yis thams cad bsang bar bya// oM a mri ta krat+ta le ha na ha na hUM phaT// yungs kar la gdab 'byung po bsreg/ rang gi snying ga'i yig 'bru las// 'od 'phros yi ge 
48b2(rgyud 'grel): a ru gyur// de 'phros taM gi yi ge las// sa gzhi rin chen bzhi ru gyur// sngags 'di btab pas bzlas par 'gyur// oM A tsaN+Da maN+Dal hUM/ grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas/ 
48b3(rgyud 'grel): oM rat+na traM maN+Da la hUM// tsan+dan ga pur gla rtsi sogs// mdzes pa'i snod du bzhag pa la// 'od 'phros pas ni du yig thim// bdug pa'i mchog tu gyur par bsam// rnal 'byor 
48b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa chung gyur yang // tsan+dan med du mi rung ngo // rgyan gyi me tog lnga gsum sogs// gcig sogs yang na lnga grangs bstun// de steng paM las pad+mar bya// sngags 'dis bdag/ 
48b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i rkyen bya'o// oM pad+ma maN+Dal hUM/ stong ldan 'bum ldan du gyur bsam// de'i steng du b+h+rUM yig las// gzhal yas khang ni mdzes pa bsam// badz+ra re khe'i sngags ni kun la 
48b6(rgyud 'grel): gdab// snying ga'i 'od kyis byin gyis brlab// mchod rdzas pad+ma mdun du bskyed// rgyu ni gong gi yi ge las// de dag thams cad rdzogs pa ni// nyams pa dgos pa gzhan mos 
48b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jug/ de 'og dam tshig nyams pa kun// lus bkru gos bzang rgyan chab go/ lgang bsam rdor dril sngags byin brlab// sa bon yi ge 'od zer gyis// lha mo bzhi bskyed lha spyan 
48b8(rgyud 'grel): drang // gsol ba gdab la rtsa sngags gdags// bla ma mi bskyod gyur sogs la// phyag 'tshal mchod pa thams cad bya// rgyud las byung ba'i bstod pa bya// mnyes pas 'od zer 
49a1(rgyud 'grel): rang 'dus pas// rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma la// kaM dang na la sdig pa bsdu// sdom nag gzugs su gyur pasams te// phyir 'gro rlung gis mdun du dbyung // sdig 
49a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs dbyung sngags kyis bsreg/ lus ngag so so'i sdig skyong ba// so so'i gnas su ni bsams te// so so'i sdig pa 'dus nas byung // gsod pa khro ba'am gong sbyor
49a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ yang na lus kyi srog chags gzugs// ngag gi yig 'bru sems kyi 'od// gzugs su dbung te rgyud las 'byung // yang na lha yi 'od zer gyis// ba spu'i bu ga kun khyab
49a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi sdig pa bsregs par bsam// de 'og 'od zer dkar po'i rgyun// bdud rtsi lta bus lus khyab nas// bsos nas mchog tu gyur par bsam// yang na brgya 
49a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa rtsa ba'i sngags// bzlas pas gong bzhin sdig pa sbyong // yi ge brgya pa'i dbang por bsgyur// brgya rtsa sngags 'bum pa zlas pa dang // sum phyed phri rab nyams sbyong / 
49a6(rgyud 'grel): sam nyis srem na sum cha dang // sum gnyis gribs 'bring gsum sbyong // de las byed phyed bribs ni// tha ma'i nyams pa rnam gsum stong // sum brgya nis brgya l-I ba 
49a7(rgyud 'grel): dang // nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas ni// yan lag che chung nyams pa sbyong // de 'og zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya// nus pa yod na tshogs 'khor bya// de 'og bum pa rnams bas 
49a8(rgyud 'grel): te// gcig tu lha mo rnams bskyed de// cig tu rdor 'dzin mi bskyod pa// bskyed nas byin rlabs tshul bzhin bya// dang po lnga mos khrus byas te// rdo rje 'dzin pas 
49b1(rgyud 'grel): med bas pa// pi bskyod bum pas dbang bskur bas// yang na gnyis kas dbang bskur bya// de 'og mchad nas 'od khrus bya// de 'og bkra shis tshig bcad brjod// 
49b2(rgyud 'grel): gong gi sbyor ba rdzogs po kun// dam tshig nyams pa'i maN+Dal yin// de las gzhan du gcig kyang rung // rdzogs la brtan pa ma thob par// maN+Dal 'jog na mkha' 'bros 
49b3(rgyud 'grel): gsod// rnal 'byor spyod lam ma zhugs par// gong ma'i miN+Dal de dag kun// yid kyis mdun du bsam byas nas// yid kyis dbul ba yid kyis yin// bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i 
49b4(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim rdzas// bsku ba nang gi yin par 'dod// phyi ru phyi yi me tog yin// bla ma la brgyud maN+Dal sbyor ka 'di// blo zhan don du bdag gis cung zad bsdus// 'khrul par gyur na mkhas// 
49b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams bzod par mdzod// 'di byas bsod kyis gos sngon shog/ rnal 'byor dbang gis nyes par snang // blun po legs par bshad pa dman// mthong rgya chungs na yangs pa'ang do/ 
49b6(rgyud 'grel): rlung dang man ngag la brten nas// rnyedang 'dod rnams kyis 'dod 'dod spyad du med// ma mthong 'dogs na skal rnams med par thal// slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa'i maN+Dal gyi sbyor ka 
49b7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// // kyi ma pa su nyig phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs// / rgya gar skad du/ karba kra ma nA mA mu mu ti/ A ba li/ bod skad du/ las kyi rim pa mu tig phreng ba 
49b8(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba// 'jam dpal dbyangs dang rdo rje bsnams// spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung thugs kyi mthu ldan pas// nyon mongs gdung ba zhi byed pa// zhabs kyi 
50a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+mo la btud nas// dang bas shin tu gus phyag 'tshal// sems can rnams la pan gdags phyir// las kyi rdo rje phreng ba 'di// rgyud rnams pa lus swa ro/ 
50a2(rgyud 'grel): nas// man ngag dgos pa btud de bshad// rgyal bas sngoran gyi dus dag tu// zhal nas gsungs pa tsam gyis ni// sems can don grub glegs bam med// de ltar rtsod pa'i dris 
50a3(rgyud 'grel): ni// po ti dag las brten gyur pas// bla mas gnang ba'i po ti la// dga' ba chen po bskyed par bya// de nas ma ga gang zag la// ston pa thugs rje che ldan pas// sdud pa rdo rje 
50a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la// rgyud pa rim gyis 'ongs pa 'di// bka' dang mi 'gal mthun pa ru// bka'o yi don nyid dpyis phyin par// man ngag rim pas bstan pa la// dga' ba chen po bsgo
50a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis// man ngag 'di ltar sten pa ni// slob dpon mkhas pa yang dag ldan// dus gsum bde gshegs dang mtshungs pa// shin tu dris che gus pas bstod// sems can 
50a6(rgyud 'grel): khang 'khyams pa la// mar me bstan pas la ma rnyed bzhin// 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i sems can la// man ngag rin chen 'di bstan pas// phyag rgya mchog gi lam rnyed 'gyur// 
50a7(rgyud 'grel): de bas shin tu drin che bas// yul zhing sde phrar bcas pa dang // rin chen la sogs nor rdzas dang // bu dang chung ma bran 'khor bcas// srog lus man chod phral gyur kyang / 
50a8(rgyud 'grel): sru drir khor mi 'gyur// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// tha ma mnyes par mi byed na// man ngag thob kyang ltung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rgyud ni sna tshogs las// bstan pa 
50a9(rgyud 'grel): ma bam sa pa sa ma mas sa mang pa pabam pa mam ma ma ma mams ma sa ma shing ma pa ma mas

50b2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma la// rnam pa bzhi ru shis byas la// phyi ltar nang ltar gsang ba ltar// de kho na nyid bzhi ru bstan// phyi ltar bstan pa'i slob ma yang // dang por dkyil 'khor bcug nas//

50b4(rgyud 'grel): bshags la brtson par bya// nyams pa chen po byung ba na// bshags nas rim pa bskyar bar bya// de ni slob dpon nyid la blang // gzhan gyi skabs dang sbyor shes bya// khrus 
50b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// nyams su zangs te spyad par bya// de yi rnal 'byor mos pa ni// tha mthun tshod chung ngu gcig/ nyin zhag 'das na nyams par 'gyur// 
50b6(rgyud 'grel): dang por bskyed rim bsgom pa ni// rim gyis sam ni cig char du// bskyed pa bsnyen par gyur pa'i tshad// thun tshod chen po bstan pa dang // kha dog spros par shes pa dang // lus 
50b7(rgyud 'grel): ngag yid gAsum skyon rnams ni// rim gyis bri bar gyur pa dang // khyad par lus kyi skyon bri'o// lus kyi mdog bzang lus snyoms dang // yun ring btang yang mi tshor na/ 
50b8(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i chang // de nas gas dbang bsrung nas ni// nang yang bstan nas rim gyis bsgom// de ltar bya yi gang zag ni// de nas mngal 'thob 
51a1(rgyud 'grel): ma ma du ba chung zangs nga zusas ma khya sa thamasas bya ma sa mas ma sas ma ma sa sa ma sa ma ma sa ma su sa mas pa

51a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro// nang ltar man ngag khyil par bstan// de nas rlung dang gtum mo dang // yig 'bru thig le rnams la bslab// de yang gsang dbang bskur nas ni// rlung dang yig 'bru
