100b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbram po'i sgrub thabs dpal zlab snying pos mdzad pa bkrugs/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra tsaN+Da kro d+ha sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo rdo rje gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje gtum po la 
101a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// dang po sgrub pa po dkon mchog gsum la dad pas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o// de nas stong pa nyid 
101a2(rgyud 'grel): du bsams la/ pad+ma dang / nyi ma'i steng du hUM la sa yang dag par byung ba'i rdo rje gtum po skra mdog nag po/ zhal cig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas pas gnam lcags kyi rdo rje zhun ma bsnams pa/ 
101a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas thugs kar sdig mdzub mdzad pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang ba/ g.yas bskum pa/ spyan gsum me'i mdog 'dra ba/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba/ bskal pa'i me'i nang 
101a4(rgyud 'grel): na bzhugs pa/ ska las khro chung dang khyung mang po 'phro ba cig gsal bar bskyed la/ snying gar hUM la/ sngags 'dis bskor la bzlas so// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ skyo na sngags hUM la bsdu'o// de 
101a5(rgyud 'grel): nas gdon gzhom par 'dod na/ rdo rje de khyung nag po phyag gnyis kyis sbal gyi mgo nas za ba/ gshog pa gdengs pa/ mchu sder rdo rje 'bar bar bsam/ g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub thur du bstan pa las me 
101a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar bar ba sam la/ sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// hUM paDa Sha Na re ma hA tsaN+Da badz+ra ga ru Na de ba then phyung / sa ga nA ga snying la gzer/ thu ma ri la rbad drag po gsum dang ldan par bzlas so// de nas 
101a7(rgyud 'grel): gdon bsad par 'dod ni/ rang gi rmi lam du ci byung ba thams cad bsreg cing sngags 'di bzlas so// oM nA ga tsaN+Da tshal pa ur ta kaM/ nA ga tsit+ta shag ti tshal pa naM/ nA ga tri sa ya ti/ bib+hU ta/ nA ga/ 
101a8(rgyud 'grel): kro d+ha bi da rA dza ya/ shi shi/ na na nan/ dul dul chud rgud thum ril dzaHdzAHlan gsum gyis thub par 'gyur ro// tha ma mnan par bya'o// gtum chung khra thog ma'i sgrub thabs/ rgyal po zla ba'i snying 
101b1(rgyud 'grel): pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// // lo ts+tsha ba sgeg pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra ga ru Ta sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ rdo rje khyung gi sgrub thabs/ rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog/ 
101b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byas la/ rang nyid rdo rje khyung kha dog nag po lag pa gnyis kyis sbrul za ba/ gshog pa dang sgro la sogs pa rnams lcags kyi ral gri me 'bar ba/ mig khro chu khol ba lta bu/ sku che ba cig/ 
101b3(rgyud 'grel): tu bas ma ste/ oM badz+ra ga ru Da tsat+ta ma hA nA ga mA ra ya sod sod/ nA ga mA ra ya thum ril rbad tsad hUM phaT/ rtag tu bzlas la ma/ yengs pas bsgrub par bya'o// 'di ni las thams cad pa'i sngags te/ gang la 
101b4(rgyud 'grel): yang bum par chu blugs la lhung skyed la bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de nas yungs kar la khrus bya'o// nad gang na bar yang byug par bya'o// bya'i sha mi bza'/ sgong mi bza'/ byal mi brdeg 
101b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu lhar bsgom par bya'o// rdo rje khyung gi sgrub pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// // slob dpon rdo rje pad+mas mdzad pa'o// paN+Di ta sa'i snying po dang / lots+tsha ba rma ban gyis bsgyur ba'o// @// rdo rje gtum pa dkyi 
101b6(rgyud 'grel): khro dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa bzhugs/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra tsaN+Da maN+Da la bi d+hi bA sa dza ka b+ha dra na ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ gsang 
101b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdag po rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// bsad pa bstan pa'i rgyud dang ni/ bla ma'i gdams pa'i lam zhugs nas// cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus 'di// rang dga' zhes pa dor de bris/ slob 
101b8(rgyud 'grel): dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing // rgyud kyi dbang thob dam tshig brtan// gzhan pan bsgrub la dga' ba la// gzhan dag gus pas gsol 'debs sam// yang na rang bzhin sgrub don du// nus pa// 
102a1(rgyud 'grel): dris la tshig gis sbyin// dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i gnas// bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal byas la// gtso bo 'bum la 'khor rnams bri// rab 'bring mtshan ma thob par 
102a2(rgyud 'grel): byA// de nas tha gas legs bgos nas// snyim pa me tog gis bkang ste// gus pos gsol ba gdab par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir// drar khrod dben pa rdo le ba dang // 
102a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon byas yid 'ong la sogs su// lto 'phye'i sbyor bas brko bar bya// brtag cing sbyang dang bsrung bar bya// nyes pa med pa'i sa gzhi der// rdo rje 'dzin par gsal ba dang // baM las skyes 
102a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha mo ser// mdzes pa brgyar ldan lus phyir sdang // bum pa 'dzin la lus mchod bstod// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang rnam thar ni// sa dang pha rol phyin 
102a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar// de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las// rgyal por byas te dkyil 'khor bri// lag pa sa la brdabs 
102a6(rgyud 'grel): pa las// dga' ba'i mdangs ldan lha mo yang // khyod ni slob dpon mchog yin gyis// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las kyis zhes// zer cing sA la thim par 'gyur// rogs la nyes pa spangs pa 
102a7(rgyud 'grel): ste// 'azas par bcag cing rnam lnga dang // dri bzangs dag ni byugs par bya// yang na me yi las kyis snang // stong pa'i sngags kyis byin brlabs te// rim pas lA yi khang par bsam// 
102a8(rgyud 'grel): mag steng du rdo rje bzhag/ bla mas khrus byas rdo rje 'chang // bskyed pa'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas// shar blta sa dkyil 'khor steng 'dug la// tshad med bzhi yis gzhan don sgrub// rnam rgyal 
102b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs bskyed pa yi// slob ma gus spos thogs la// mchod la tshig 'di brjod par bya// hUM byams pa chen po rdo rje 'dzin// zhe sdang dag pas me long ye shes gsal// gtum po gdug pa 'dul 
102b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa// rdo rje bsdams la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus gnas// chos kun bdag dang bral ba'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su 
102b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol// de bzhin lho phyogs la sogs nas// hUM snying rje chen po rdo rje 'dzin// nga rgyal dag pa mnyam nyid ye shes mchog/ gtum po gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa// rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 
102b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yi// mtshan min thams cad spangs pa ste// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol// hUM dga' ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags 
102b5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa so sor rtog/ gtum po gdug pa kun 'dul ba// rdo rje bsdams la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi ba mchog gi chos chen po// ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 
102b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dam pa bzhengs sku gsol// hUM btang snyoms chen po rdo rje 'dzin// gti mug rnam dag nan tan ye shes mchog/ gtum po gdug pa kun 'dul ba// rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sems 
102b7(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi srog chen po// rang bzhin rnam dag dri ma med// kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// khro zhing brjid pa'i skur/ 
102b8(rgyud 'grel): byas te// rkang pa'i hUM las rdo rje bsam// mig gnyis ni zla 'bar ba ste// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis// 'jigs spangs byang shar mtshams song la// rang gis bstod cing nga rgyal gyis// hUM dkyil 'khor 
103a1(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi la gnas pa'i// lha sogs bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig/ nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// nga yi bka' las ma 'da' bar// bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'gro bar gyis// 
103a2(rgyud 'grel): gal te khyed rnams mi 'gro na// ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba yis// mgo bo tshol pa brgyar 'gas shing // lus rnams stong du gyur nas ni// rnam par 'joms par gdon mi za// de bas khyed rnams 
103a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du dengs// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sarba big+ha na uts+tsha ta ya paT/ ces pas bgegs rnams bskrad par bya// gar stabs kyis ni bskor ba dang // dang por phyin la 'di skad brjod// gang 
103a4(rgyud 'grel): dag mi 'gro'i bgegs yod na// lus ngag yid kyi nus pa rnams// gzhom phyir khro bo'i phur bus gdab// kI li ya zhes btab nas kyang // arko Ta yas+tha brdung bar bya// mi ri la sogs sngags 
103a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsrung // gtso bo'i gdan ni gru bzhi ste// 'khor lo dri chus zlum por bya// kha dog mthun pa'i me tog dgram// sa yi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // lha ni lhag par gnas pa bya// rang sar lha rnams rdzogs 
103a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // mchod bstod me tog spos thogs la// hUM dus gsum pa de gshegs thams cad kyi// thugs kyi sras po rdo rje 'chang // dpal po rdo rje bde mas 'khyud// 'khor gyi khro bo ma lus kun// kun 
103a7(rgyud 'grel): nas bdag la dgongs nas kyang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa dang // slob ma rnams la phan pa'i phyir// rdo rje can bdag che ge zhes// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol// rjes su 
103a8(rgyud 'grel): brtse bas nyer dgongs te// sang ni dgyes pas byon par mdzod// gzhan yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba ma lus dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed rnams// 
103b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bstan pa'i chos skyong rnams// gang dag rdo rje'i spyan ldan pa// rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ deng dag 'dri bar gyur pa la// bdag dang skol ldan slob ma rnams// byin gyis 
103b2(rgyud 'grel): brlab phyir srung bar mdzod// bum pa lhag par gnas 'dod pas// rin chen 'byung khungs las byung ba// dri ma med cing lto ba che// mgrin phra mchu bya phyang dri zhim chus// dkar zhal byas nas 
103b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma dgod// rnam rgyal phyag mtshan rdzogs par bri// sprad cing chu dang byang sems dang // bya bri seng khri dbyig pa dang // ut+pal gzhan gyis mi thub pa// zhes de ba gser dngul dang // mu tig 
103b4(rgyud 'grel): mu men byu ru gzhug/ nag til gro sran mud ka dang // ga bur dzA ti gur kum mchog/ tsan dan gnyis dang a ka dra// mar dang bra ram sbrang rtsi dang // lan tshwa rnams kyis lto ba dgang // gos kyis 
103b5(rgyud 'grel): mgrin po bkab pa dang // tsU ta la sogs 'bras bu can// yang na me tog yod pas brgyan// me tog ldan pa'i ras stengs sam// ku sha'i gdan lar ba sar bzhugs// bum pa brelas gzhal 
103b6(rgyud 'grel): yas khang // chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan bcas pa// rnam rgyal lha rnams tshegs par bskyed// gzhan du sa bon gang yin pas// cho ga ma lus rdzogs pas bskyed// hUM khro bo gdug pa 'dul// rang bzhin 
103b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga yis dngos// rnam dag dri med skra 'chang ba// bgro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs skul gnyis med 'khyud// stong pa nyid kyi bde ster ma// dmar ljang gri gug zod 
103b8(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dzin// dpa' mo bde ma phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung thugs dang phrin las kyi// gtso bo khro chen 'jigs pa che// gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs pa'i sku// phyogs kyi khro bo phyag 'tshal lo// 
104a1(rgyud 'grel): mar me ba dug spros dri chab ma// zhal zas kyis ni tshim byed pa// mchod pa'i lha mo dgos 'dod 'byung // mtshams su bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo// lcags kyu zhags pa lpags 
104a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrog ma// dgyes pa'i dril bu sgrogs mdzad ma// khro bo dbang phyug chen mo rnams// sgom bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// bstod cing srang bu dang ldan pas// phrin las sbyar zhing bzlas par bya// 
104a3(rgyud 'grel): gtor mas mchod cing gsol bgr-i dab// slob ma lhag par gnas pa yang // bsrung zhing mdzes pa'i me tog thogs// khrus byas gtsang mo'i gos ldan zhing // dga' ba'i sems kyis gsol 
104a4(rgyud 'grel): bgadab// dpal ldar rdo rje 'dzin pa che// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems mchog bdag la stsol/ 
104a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsu pa dag kyang bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni gzhug par mdzod// lan gsum bar du gsol ba 
104a6(rgyud 'grel): gdab// 'od kyis pur byas sdig pa sbyong // rjes su gzung bas spro ba ni// bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga mchog/ khyod la yang / 
104a7(rgyud 'grel): dag bshad par bya// rdo rje mi byed mthu yis ni// mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes mchog/ de bas kun mkhyen thob 'dod pas// bu yis blo gros 'di yis gyis shig/ bla ma sangs rgyas kun 
104a8(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing // rtsa ba yan lag nyes pa spongs// ma sgral 'khor ba'i sems can la// snying rje chen por rab bskyed nas// bsgral zhing grol ba'i lam la bkod// bde bar dbugs ni dbyung 
104b1(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis// slob ma'i tshogs kyis sdig bshags la// dge bsnyen la sogs rim pas sbyin// gang yin bslab pa bstan pa dang // slob ma ltar bya yang na ni// gnas gsum lhar bcas
104b2(rgyud 'grel): rtags btab la// bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang // bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// 'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kyang // bdag la dgongs nas gzigs su gsol// bdag gis
104b3(rgyud 'grel): thog ma med pa nas// sdig pa bgyis pa ma lus kun// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// spyan sngar da ltar mthol zhing bshags// bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang // sangs rgyas kun bdag
104b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can// de rigs 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// dge ba mdzad la rjes yi rang // bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// gsang sngags badrag pos dbang / 
104b5(rgyud 'grel): bskur la// gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor bar bsgral// mthu ldan skyon med khyed rnams la// skyergan 'tsha mi mnga' yang // 'gro ba'i don du sku sprul pa// mthun 'jug mya ngan mi 'dal gsol/ 
104b6(rgyud 'grel): don dam rang bzhin mtshan ma med// mtshan mar mi rtog chos sku 'o// bde gshegs mtshan do pe'i slar gnang ba// rdo rje can la skyabs su mchi// dus gsum mgon po thugs rje can// 
104b7(rgyud 'grel): byams pa'i thugs las ma ga yos kyang // dgos pa'i dbang gis khro sprul la// gsang sngags lha tshogs kun skyabs mchi// des bslu ba des mtshon gsung gi chos// nyi shu rtsa brgyad 
104b8(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i tshogs// chos kyi rang bzhin dri ma med// chos kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi// sna tshogs sku sprul don mchog bsgrub// rin chen skyabs mchog dge 'dun dang // 'phags pa 
105a1(rgyud 'grel): gos sngon byang chub sems// dge 'dun mchog la skyabs su mchi// bla ma dus gsum mgon po dang // bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// 'khor dang bcas la lus 'bul bas// 
105a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhes nas bdag la rjes brtse bas// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas// tshogs gnyis las byung dge ba rnams// 'khor ba'i sems can 
105a3(rgyud 'grel): malus don// byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya// byang chub tu yang sems bskyed la// sngags kyi dam tshig sbyin par bya// maN+Dal mngon du 'gro ba yis// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang // bcom 
105a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan rdo rje gtum po dang // dkon mchog gsum dang bstan dga' kun// bidag la dgongs nas gzigs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di// dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas 
105a5(rgyud 'grel): su// byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// / 
105a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu ni nges gnas pa// tshul khrims rnam gsum sdom pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims rnams// so sor bdag gis gzung bar bya// 
105a7(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig yin par rgyal bas bsgrags// rdo rje dril bu
105a8(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang // skyon bral rdo rje chen po'i rigs// thugs rjes 'brel pa'i slob dpon ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya// dri ma med pa'i dam tshig chos// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin re bzhin 
105b1(rgyud 'grel): du dus drag tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bya// byang chub chen po las byung ba// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya// las 
105b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ni// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// sdom pa ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid du so sor bzung // byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar// mchod pa'i las
105b3(rgyud 'grel): ni ci nus kyis// ma bsgral ba ni bdag gis bsgral// ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgrol// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyung bgyi// sems can dngos grub che la dgod// dkyil 'khor me/ 
105b4(rgyud 'grel): shog mngon par bcas// rdo rje 'chang la dbul bar bya// bdud rtsi rnam ldag tor ma'i tshogs// rnam pa kun tu bsten par bya// thabs kyi bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// snying rje las byung 
105b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgral bar bya// lan gsum bar du dam bcas la// rigs kyi lha las 'od 'phros pas// rang rang ye shes yig bzhis bstim// rdo rje khu tshur dri yi chus// mas rim bzhin du 
105b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya// de rjes mchod pa spro bar bya// a shrad tha dad pa la sha/ u dum wa ra la sogs pa'i// sor bcu 'am ni yang na brgyad// rtse mo me tog mdzes pas brgyan// dkyil 
105b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'dab brgyad rnam lngas byug/ shar bltas dbus su sos bzung nas// dam pa'i phyag rgyas dor byas te// khyod ni dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// zhugs pa'i dngos grub brtag 
105b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// rnam shes dag pa'i so shing 'di// so shing gnas ni dbus su dor// bdag dang bla ma steng bltas nas// mchog gi dngos grub dam pa yin// phyogs su phyin las so// 
106a1(rgyud 'grel): sotwe// mtshams su 'jig rten dngos grub 'byung // zur bltas sa 'og grub pa yin// sal ma lhung mkha' sprod do// bdud rtsi byin brlabs thod par blag/ rdo rje 'di 
106a2(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje'i chu// 'thung cig dam tshig byin gyis brlabs// gal te dam tshig 'das pa na// dmyal bar nges par bsreg byed do// oM hr-i khi shud+d+ha d+harmA sarba pA paM niSh+ya sho d+ha ya bi kalpan a 
106a3(rgyud 'grel): pa na hUM ya hUM lan gsum skyor chus ngag dag byas// lha dang rjes mthun skud pa la// sngags btab ga yas dang phrin las g.yon// khro bo gtum po'i byin brlabs dang // gsang sngags nus 
106a4(rgyud 'grel): pa bla na med// skal ldan por chad med par bsrung // su yang sdod pa ma byed cig/ ku sha gtsang ma byin brlabs de// bzhin bzangs tshur nyon dkyil 'khor du// 'jug pa'i rtags rnam
106a5(rgyud 'grel): brtag pa'i phyir// ku sha'i rtsa 'di sngags dang stan// thub pas ting 'dzin grub ltar shog/ ma nor seng ge bzhin zhal nas// mtshan ma ji ltar blang ba ltar// bla ma'i mdun du brjod par 
106a6(rgyud 'grel): bya// bzang na dngos grub spro ba bskyed// gal te ngan na bskrad dang bsrung // me yi las kyis bzlog par bya// gzhan yang dge ba'i las kun shis// bla mas rdo rje can mchod la// 
106a7(rgyud 'grel): nang par langs te dkyil 'khor pa// num mkhar bteg la thig gdab ste// bu mo gtsang zhing sdom ldan gyis// bkal ba ra sa bal las byung ba// ye shes lnga ni gcig bsdus pa'am// 
106a8(rgyud 'grel): yang na sku gsung thugs kyang rung // oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA s+pha ra s+phA ra a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA a d+yan ta a nu pra biSh+Ti sarba d+harmA/ zhes brjod pas bsgril bar bya// pad+ma'i snod du bzhag 
106b1(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // mi 'chi lnga yis spang byas la// blo ldan ye shes bstim byas la// nam mkhar ye shes dza dza gdab// sgo yis bcu gnyis cha dang ldan// srid kyang khang pa gnyis 'gyur la/ 
106b2(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i las thig drang byas nas// oM badz+re sa ma ya sU traM ma ti kra ma hUM/ tshangs dang zung thig la sogs pa// bstan bcos mthong zhing blo ldan des// cha ni gang yin rnam par dbye// 
106b3(rgyud 'grel): gal te zhes pa'i 'bras bu ni// chad na bla ma'i srog g.yo zhing // sman ldag nad kyis btab par 'gyur// phyogs 'khrul slob ma rmongs par 'gyur// blo ldan zhes pa med par bya// gru bzhi/ 
106b4(rgyud 'grel): drang rna babs bcas// dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan// nyi bla dril bu dbyer khas spras// pad+ma khyams dang rdo rje'i phreng // dur khrod me ri la sogs pa// rnam pa ma lus rdzogs par bya// 
106b5(rgyud 'grel): drin rten rna ma 'bru byed dang // 'thung krung pa las byung rnam pa la// badz+rar sI sor ba gyu bya ste// sngags kyis bdab pa yig 'grubs pa/ ye shes bsgom pa yigags 
106b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis// byin gyis brlabs te mthing kha blangs// dbang ldan mtshams su drang bya ste// 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa sde// sems can khams ni sgrol byed pa// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa/ 
106b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de bzhin ljang du drang byas la// 'di ni so sor rtog pa dag/ dmar po mnyam nyid ye shes te// ser po bya ba grub pa la// dkar po/ 
106b8(rgyud 'grel): me long ye shes dag/ me dog dor la mtshan ma brtag/ thams cad g.yas bskor ma nor bar// sbom 'phra chad pa med par bri// nyes pa 'byung ba'i rim pa ni// tshon mi mnyam zhing yo 
107a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rma// dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ba yin// yon pos rtsod la gdud par 'gyur // srom na nang 'byung gal te pra// nor nyams chad par gyur pas na// 'chi 'gyur 
107a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs nyams phur bus 'debs// shar dkar lho ser nub phyogs dmar// byang phyogs in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ lte ba mthon mthing 'khyil bar bya// mtshams sogs cho gas brtags pa
107a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // dur khrod rnams ni rim pas bri// rdo rje dkyil 'khor lhar bsgrub pa// yol bas bcad pa'i dkyil 'khor du// khrus byas dri yis lus byugs te// gos bzang gis brgyan lan gsum 
107a4(rgyud 'grel): bskor// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// ngargyal byas de ng+ge sgrogs pas// shar gyi sgo nas nang du zhugs// sgo bzhi yang ni dbye bar bya// oM badz+ra ud g+ha Ta sa ma yA be shwa ya b+h+rUM// bum par 
107a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gnas 'dug byas te// mchod pa'i rdzas kyis legs brgyan nas// dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed// ye shes bstim la mchod par bya// bstod cing glu dang ldan pa yis// 
107a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod par bya// de nas lhag pa'i lha yang bsdu// bzlas pa'i rim pa bzhin du brjod// shar du zhi ba'i me las bya// de nas shar gyi dbang stegs pa// slob ma'i cho ga
107a7(rgyud 'grel): ji lta bar// slob dpon dbang dang ldan par bya// me tog thogasA la tshig 'di brjod// hUM thugs kyi sras po rdo rje 'dzin// gdug pa 'dul mdzad gtum po yis// slob ma smin par bya 
107a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir// bdag la dbang bskur sbyin par mdzod// de ltar rim pa rdzogs pa dang // de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// yol ba'i phyir gnas rim pa bzhin// khrus byas sngags 'dis/ 
107b1(rgyud 'grel): dag par bsam// kA ya bAka tsit+ta sarba pA paM sho d+ha ni swAhA// de nas lhur byas gnas gsum du// oM badz+ra ban d+ha dra Ta kA ya bA ga tsit+ta/ zhes pas sdig pa dral byas la// rang rang yi ges bsam 
107b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// bgegs bskang sdig pa gzhom pa dang // bla mas rang gi sa bon gyis// slob ma'i sdig pa sbyang bar bya// oM kA ya shud d+ha sarba d+harma kA ya shud d+ho daM/ oM bA ga shud+d+ha sarba d+harma bAka 
107b3(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ho haM/ oM tsit+ta shud+d+ha sarba d+har+m+ma tsit+ta shud+d+ho haM/ rnam dag lha yi ngo bor bya// gdong ba ras kyis bkab nas ni// bu khyod su yin ci la dga'// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// slob dpon 
107b4(rgyud 'grel): mgon la skyabs su mchi// gtso bo khro bor bcas pa yis// lha rnams kun la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni bskal bzang rigs yin te// rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la dga'// phrin las ma lus 
107b5(rgyud 'grel): khyod la rdzogs// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du// mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod// slob mas yon phul sngags 'di brjod// oM a khaM bI ra hUM/ rang rang gnas su bzhag nas/ 
107b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang // bgegs kyi bar chad gsal bar bya// dkyil 'khor la ni bskor byas te// shar gyi phyogs nas sgo phye la// lha dang sangs rgyas rnams bskul te// sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs 
107b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis// bdud bzhi rnam par dag bcom nas// sngags 'dis phyag gsum brkyang la bya// oM na ma te hUM/ oM na ma me hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA// de nas thal sbyang shar phyogs nas// oM hri 
107b8(rgyud 'grel): lo kya bi dza ya/ pu dze pas+tha nA ya/ at+ma naM nir+ya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga da ak+Sho b+h+ya/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a d+hi tiSh+Tha ta swa maM/ mi skyod brgya byin steng du gsal// oM ma hA kA la pu dzo pas+tha nA ya/ At+ma naM ni ru tA/ 
108a1(rgyud 'grel): ya ma/ sarbata thA ga dang d+ha sa b+hA ba/ aT+Ta/ Sh+Tha maN+DataHsa ma/ wA thugs nas p+lag zlas te// zul byung sgra ni thab 'jug mnan// nab nas gsung gi dbang phyug gnas 
108a2(rgyud 'grel): oM amr-id+hakuN+Da li/ pradz+re bas+than yaM/ Ang+gen ni r+yata yA ma~M/ siHta thA ga ta pad+ma d+hadaM Ab+hi/ ny+tsa/ ang+gi deHta sa maM/ oM A dze b+ha la pU dzi pra swanA ya/ At+man ni rbad yA maM/ sarbatathA 
108a3(rgyud 'grel): gta a mog+na sid+d+ha/ a b+hi Shiny+dza oMn+ta teHtas maM/ nub byed rim pas byug bya'o// las kyi brim pas khrus byas te// sdom pa ma lus pa yang sbyin// byin gyis brlabs phying ye shes kyang / 
108a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la ni gsol ba gdag// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlabs mdzad la// rdo rje sems dpa' thun med// bdag la da ltar bskyed du gsol/ 
108a5(rgyud 'grel): sdig bral spos kyi sa bdug byas nas// 'gyong bcas rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// sangs rgyas ma lus lhag pa'i lhar// bsdus la gnyis med bde ba che// zag med bde bas yan lag 
108a6(rgyud 'grel): khyab// bruM 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig sde// rdo rje gtum po sems dpa' che// ye shes rdo rje bla med 'di// da lnga nyid du 'bab pAr shog/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ a b+hau sha ya sta/ 
108a7(rgyud 'grel): tA pA ye/ rA dA rA rA/ tsa lA ya/ AhAM maN+Da dz+nyAM badz+ra tsaN+Da a be sha ya a a a a a zhes pa b+h+ra sa gang la ba ba gyur kyang // oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ a d+h+yeSh+TaM te sa ma ya/ sngags 
108a8(rgyud 'grel): kyis brtan byas lce la a// dge mi dge'i lung bstan bya// me tog rdo rje dang bcas pa// spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad brjod// hUM rdo rje gtum po deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag 
108b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa ni// gal te tshul 'di gzhan smras na// de ma thag tu bral te gshegs// bdud rtsi lngas bkang ka pA lang // sngags btab rdo rje dang bcas sbyin// hUM 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i chu// 
108b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig nyams na bsreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs ni dngos grub rnams// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// oM a hUM/ badz+re pra ka hUM/ shar du 'dug ste 'di skad brjod// deng / 
108b3(rgyud 'grel): nas brtsams te khyed rnams kyi// rdo rje gtum po yin gyi// khyod kyis ngal brnyas pa na// mi bdi ma spangs dus byas nas// dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re// phyogs bzhi nas ni dngos 
108b4(rgyud 'grel): grub brtag/ mdzes pa'i me tog lngal dor// gsang ba tha med me dog 'di// pho brang dkyil 'khor lnga mchog la// las dang rjes mthun brtse ba yis// rigs dang mthun par 'bab 
108b5(rgyud 'grel): par shog/ pra ti dza ho badz+ra/ lha'i bstod dang rked pa dang // smad dang nye ring gtso 'khor gyi// bye brag dngos grub brtags yin no// de nas bla mas me tog blangs// slob ma'i mgor bcing 
108b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di brjod// oM d+har+m+ma kun d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ lha bstim rigs kyi ming yang gzung // sngon gyi mig pakhan rgyal po yis// ma rig ling dog bsal ba ltar// de bzhin khyod kyi miH/ 
108b7(rgyud 'grel): dbye ste// ye shes mig gi mthong bar shog/ badz+ra tsAk+Shu dral gri// gdong g.yogs pa shus la'ang skad brjod// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// mthong na dang b.rab tu skye// thod na 
108b8(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rigs su gyur// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin ba rlabs de// dngos grub ma lus sdong du 'gyur// rigs kyi rnam par dag pa bstan// de nas slob ma dang ldan pas// tham 
109a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bas la phyag byas te// yon mchog bla med bral nas kyang // dbang bskur ba yi gsol ba gang ba// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod cing gsol mdzad 
109a2(rgyud 'grel): pa// bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag gsol// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag ni slob dpon mchog bgyid do// lanA gsum brjod 
109a3(rgyud 'grel): nas shar phyogs su// pad+ma 'dab brgyad khril 'dug/ rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs pas// chu rnams thod pa'am bum par bsdus// rdo rje'i glu dang dril bur ldan// rigs lnga rig pa'i 
109a4(rgyud 'grel): lha mor ldan// bag chags mA lus dag byas te// sgra gsung dam tshig las byung ba'i// ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med// lha'i bdud rtsi rnam dag 'dres// mAM bskyod rdo rje'i dbang bskur 
109a5(rgyud 'grel): ro// oM A darga dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa b+hU/ chu yi dbang bskur dam pa 'dis// sgrib pa rnam pa gsum brel nas// ma bstod rnam dag ye shes 'thob// mi bskyod rdo rje dngos grub 
109a6(rgyud 'grel): shog/ lugs ma'am thang ka 'a bu re bris pa'i// gser sogs dbu brgyan rin 'byung bsam// dbu brgyan rin chen dam pa 'dis// sems can tshim par byed pa'i mchog 
109a7(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin bsam pa 'grub byed pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra sa ma hA/ dz+nyA na hU tiSh+Tha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ dbu rgyan dbang bskur dam pa 'dis// rigs lnga'i 
109a8(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs// bdag gi mgo la rgyan gyur te// rin tshon 'byung ldan dngos grub shog/ rin chen la sogs rdo rje la// snang ba mtha' yas bcug byas la// lag tu 
109b1(rgyud 'grel): gtad la tshig 'di brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang // mi byed rnam dag 'od gsal stong // dam chos 'byung ba'i sgor gyur pa// rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro// oM badz+rA pAH 
109b2(rgyud 'grel): bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur dpa pa 'dis// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin// bdag gi rgyud las skyes gyur te// snang ba mtha' yas dngos grub shog/ dril bur don yod 
109b3(rgyud 'grel): grub pa bcug/ lag pag yon gtad tshig 'di brjod// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'gro ni mnyam pa me de byed pa// 'dod pa'i phrin las rdzogs byed cing // dril bu las 
109b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang bskur bas// oM kr-i d+ha nut+tA ra/ dz+nyA na pa ta a b+hi Sheny+tsa hUM/ dril bu'i dbade bskur dam pa 'dis// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kye// gsung gi dngos grub bdag 
109b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur te// don yod grub pa'i dngos grub shog/ rnam snang ba skyed las tshogs ma'i steng // 'khor lo thogs pa'i ming sgrogs te// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas// byang chub thob pa'i bar 
109b6(rgyud 'grel): duni// ces kyang gzhom par mi nus pas// rdo rje meng du rab tu grags// oM pra ta~M she d+harmA d+ha tA dz+nyA na nA a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi hUM/ ming gi dbang bskur dam pa'adis// stong gsum bye ba phrag 
109b7(rgyud 'grel): brgya ru// sprul pas 'gro rnams chos ston cing // rnam par snang mdzad dngos grub shog/ rigs lnga yum gyis ma rig lnga// rnam dag ye shes lnga sbyor bas// rig pa'i dbang du rgyud pas 
109b8(rgyud 'grel): bstan// shar du seng ge'i khri la 'dug/ steng du gdugs dkar phug nas kyang // phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur te// slob dpon rang bzhin 'di pag mchog/ skal pa chen po bdag la 
110a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol// bde gshegs rnams kyi dbang bskur ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa// de ni sangs rgyas dpag med do// brtul zhugs bla na med pa de// ji ltar 
110a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bzhin bdag la gsol// de nas rnam rgyal bum pa blangs// mgo steng bzhag la tshig 'dis sbyin// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ 
110a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin pa yin// phrin las thogs pa med pa rnams// bu yis gzhan don bla med byos// khyod ni rdo rje slob dpon yin// dus 
110a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum sangs rgyas sras yin no// zhes bya dung dang rol mo dbul// lung bstan bya phyir bla ma yis// sprul pa'i skur bcas dga' dang bcas// chos gos bzung la 'di skad brjod// 
110a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gshegs// srid pa'i mtha' ni grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton// kye rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa che ge zhes// sid+d+hi badz+ra tsar+b+ba ta thA ga/ 
110a6(rgyud 'grel): te sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hur b+hu ba swAhA// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus pas// khyod la lung bstan byas pa 'dis// gsang sngags rdo rje'i mthu yin pas// dad pas 'di la spro bar gyis// 
110a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje brtul zhags sbyin// dz+dzarje lag tu legs byin la// 'di de sangs cas thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na bsnams// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // phyugs 
110a8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yA tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+waM d+ha ra ya mi ni hi hUM/ de nas dril bu sbyin byas te// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 
110b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha/ g+haN+De sa ma yaSh+Thi ta a shwata d+harma mi ni hi hUM/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 
110b2(rgyud 'grel): mi shes rab rib bsal ba ltang // bu khyod kyi yang mi shes pa'i// ma rig ling tog bsal bar bya// sman ldan gser gyi zur ma yis// ye shes dag par mig 'byed do// oM badz+ra 
110b3(rgyud 'grel): natra a pa ha ra pa Ta laM hri/ de nas me long g.ya' dag bstan// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bus te// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// brjod du med cing gzung du med// rgyu dang las lwa 
110b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'byung // de nas rdo rje me long phyar// rdo rje sems dpa' me long ltar// dag cing gsal la dri ma med// sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin ni// bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas// 
110b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ho yis mda' gzhu sbyin// bskyod la phyogs bzhir bdud la 'phang // de nas hUM las skyes pa yis// 'khor lo rkang pa'i bar bcug la// de ring phan chad 'jig rten la// skyob pa
110b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// kun tu dri ma sdig dang bral// de nas dud byin bus nas kyang // chos kyi dung ni bla na med// som gnyis yid gnyis mi bya 
110b7(rgyud 'grel): zhing // dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su// sangs rgyas spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ 'jig rten 'dir ni rab tu sgrogs// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la// phan bdags drin du gzo zhes 
110b8(rgyud 'grel): bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di kun kyang // khyod ni rjes su bsrung bar byed// de nas rigs lngar bsam byas la// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par// sems can ma lus drang ba'i phyir// 
111a1(rgyud 'grel): chags pa med pa'i bsam pa yis// ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyis// de bzhin rigs kyis gang 'dul ba// khyod kyi phrin las mchog 
111a2(rgyud 'grel): yin no// de nas slar yang rdo rje 'dzin// gsal bar byas te tshig 'di brjod// de nas bzung nas rigs kyi bus// zhi rgyas dbang dang bsad pa dang // dgug dang bcing dang sreg pa 
111a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // bskrad dang dbye ba la sogs pa'i// phrin las sna tshogs bsgrub par gyis// ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang // mchil lham de bzhin ri lu ste// thun mong dngos grub ma lus pa// 
111a4(rgyud 'grel): de dag khyod kyis bsgrub par gyis// ma lus snang ba byin par bya// bi de bar dbugs dbyung rnams kyang sbyin// khyad par bkra shis dbang rnams dang // rim pa bzhin du rdzogs par bya// 
111a5(rgyud 'grel): gal te gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// bzhin bzangs mig yang sa lang tshor ldan// lus la dri yis byugs byas ni// brtse dang rgod pas g.yo byas la// thabs dang shes rab gnyis phab 
111a6(rgyud 'grel): ste// nor bu byang chub sems lhung bas// bde gshegs khu ba mtheb srin gyis// dril bcas slob ma'i kha raru rba ba// a ho su kas te lhung ngo // rdo rje ra yis nyon mongs 'joms// mtshan 
111a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan bde ba bskyed pa de// yol bas par bcad snyoms 'jug brtsam// bsrub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgra yi rgyun med longs spyod kyis// brlabs kyi rgyun ni chad pa las// 
111a8(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa ye shes kyang // rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dran par bya// skad cig de dang ma bral na// mi tog ye shes skye bar 'gyur// de nyid brjod du med pa la// brjod med tshig gi dbang

111b3(rgyud 'grel): gadrenas dran pas// grub mi pa de'i su rjegs pa/ kyi ltar smras pa pastor// smon la mag pa cing dge ba bsngo// tharangs tshon bsdus bus 
111b4(rgyud 'grel): bla b+hag/ tshwa'am 'a ma n+d+hags grags// dri bzangs kyis na thig rgyas la// sa zhi ba'i ma lasaH// yid na 'phongs pa sa pa dang // rkye kyi las la brtson par / 
111b5(rgyud 'grel): deSh+T+ri rkyen la sngags paSh+Ta sad // b+hU ba'i myu d+ha hU~M thu byung // dring bad smras byur ba dgan slo bar byas// 'byud nas tshogs m+b+ha rnaMs bshags phyur \u0f7f// bzung 
111b6(rgyud 'grel): mdod bsdus chog mchog/ gzhan phyir bkod pa'i dge ba yis// rigs drug gi tum po la bzhugs nas// byung du de yi 'bras thob shog/ rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 
111b7(rgyud 'grel): bzang po mdang bsdus pa zhes d+hAH/ rmob dpan las kyi rdoHsa mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgyag bye ba tita zla ba ba zang po dang / zod kyi lo m+b+ha ba stan drang der mtshul khrims kyis bsgrur 
111b8(rgyud 'grel): 'o/ sa da so ma pa na pa sa// / rgyagar ska / bar d+ha badz+ra pa ad+yan matin+dats+tshak+Sha/ zong skad du/ 'phags pa bzhin/ 
112a1(rgyud 'grel): rdorje gas kyad ba cad nas bya brgyad kyi rnam par bshad pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sepas dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bden pa gnyis lar ba gnas shing / 
112a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel pa'i// bzhin po thob pakun dngas yod tan pa la sa~M kun gyi bdag pa de// shes rab thabs kyis mya ngan mtha' spangs nas// snying rje chen pos sems can 
112a3(rgyud 'grel): mun 'thibs pa// mun pa mthong b+h+yo pa rtswa ba nyon mong pa'i mdzad pa// gsang sngabs sdang mdzad me g.yo bcom ldan 'das// thubs rje bsnyel ba med la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi sags 
112a4(rgyud 'grel): bar byas pa de rnams byas pa pa yin tshe ga don srod dang ldan// den 'dir ni gsang ba don las dga' ba ses// tshig gi skyon bral mar dag nyams dang ldan// shAkya'i rigs kyi mdangagadon ldan 
112a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par bstan pa las// shes rab dmigs pa byed pas bshad zin bstan pa dag/ de dag dmar glor 'dir ni gsal bar byas// des ni nyi zla dag dang mthun pa'i bstan bcos 'di// thugs/ 
112a6(rgyud 'grel): rjenye bar bsngos pa yis// snying rje ldan pa'i sems kyis su// rtsa rdung pan drag bshad par bya// rtsa nu rang bzhin po rnams la// sde tshan lngalnga nyi shulnga// yA sha mtha' bcas rtsubalngan/ 
112a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab yi ge gnyis ldan gsum du 'dus// brjod pa rtogs byed tshig gi dod// rtsa ba baishang dang tshig gi dod phyi pa// phyi ma mchog dang ma log bzhi ru ston// bcom ldan rdo 
112a8(rgyud 'grel): 'chang chen pos// 'og min chos dbyings po brang du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas der sangs cas// sprul ba po ni 'dir sangs rgyas// ma lus pa yi stobs kyis su// sku de rnam pa gsum 
112b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi don// thob byed rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi lam// dngos byed 'bras bu'i lam yin te// rgyu ni tshogs te dran sogs pa'i// phyi zhing dro ba'i rang bzhin te// nyon mongs dam tshig zhi rtse mo'o// phyir mi 
112b2(rgyud 'grel): ldog dang 'jig rten mthar stobs lnga// dbang po lnga yi rang bzhin no// byang chub yan lag bdun po ni// mthong lam skad cig bcu drug go/ sa dang bsgom lam mthar byin 'bras bu'o// dngos 
112b3(rgyud 'grel): byed lam ni 'bras bu sngags// byin gyis brlabs sngags mthu yon tan no// lam ma bgrod pas 'bras bu med// dper na gru gzing bskyod pa yis// rin chen mchog ni thob par 'gyur// brjod// 
112b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ston pa'i tshig gis kyang // 'bras bu bden pa myur du 'byin// des na sngags ni gsang sngags lam// lam ma bgrod par gsal byed 'gyur// des na brjod ya khyad kyi nus pa yin no// 'di// 
112b5(rgyud 'grel): skad la sogs pa bshad pa mdzes pa bya ba'i phyir/ rgud 'di par brjod bya ba dang / dgos pa dang 'brel pa dang / mchog gi dgos pa bstan par bya ste/ brjod bya dngos po med pa'i tshig ni/ bstan/ 
112b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang rtogs pa sngon du gtong ba rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ dung la dkar po spyi ni 'jug gi spyi bye brag la 'khrul pa bzhin no// des na skyon yod pa'i phyir chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba rnams mi 
112b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jug go/ des na byis pa dang smon pa dang mchog yin zhing gzhan la sogs pa ni dgos pa med snyam pa'am// 'di nyid kyi ma yin snyam pas mi 'jug ste/ tshig dang don thams cad kyi 'brel pa
112b8(rgyud 'grel): dang / brjod bya dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa yang dgos pa rnams gtan la phab pa sngon du byas nas mchod pas na/ 'di nyid 'brel pa la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du 'brel 
113a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang brjod pa bshad par ces te mi b+ha/ smon pa'i tshig bzhin du mi 'brel ba'am/ mo shra ma la sogs pa la don med par/ 'dod pa'i zhen pas tshig chad par 'gyur bas ma 
113a2(rgyud 'grel): deng gi gzugs la zhen pa'i 'dod pa rnams ci nas kyang tshig chad par 'gyur zhes brtags nas 'jug par mi 'gyur ba nyid do// de bas na 'jug pa'i yan lag gi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te/ thog 
113a3(rgyud 'grel): ma nyid du dgos par brjod par bya'o// de gang las shes par bya ba'i phyir/ dgos pa dang 'brel pa brjod par bya ba yang bstan to// de nas dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa bstan to// 
113a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod bya ji lta bu snyam pa la/ 'di ltar lam dang 'bras bu brjod bya'i 'bras bur rtog ces bya'o// brjod bya ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so// de yang sgras drangs nas blo la dngos su snang bas 
113a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos kyi brjod bya zhes nas snang ba zhen pa'i brjod byas// sgra drangs pa'i tshig gi don 'dis brjod bya rtogs pas brjod bya/ mtshon par byed pa'i tshig la yang brjod bya 'di yi don zhes 'brel 
113a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ 'di ltar la pa la rten pas 'bras bu thob ste/ de ni de dang 'gal ba'i chos spong bar 'gyur ro// gal te de ltar yin du zad mod/ de nyid bstan pa ci phyir snyam nas des na 'dir sla'i 
113a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs la brten par nam yang rdzogs pa mi 'bung ngo // ci'i phyir gal te byung na ni thams cad gzhung gi tshogs la sogs pa mi bltos par 'gyur na ni don med do// gal te yod na thams cad 
113a8(rgyud 'grel): skye ba'am/ rkyen med pa rtogs pa thar par gyur pa las/ chu med 'bras bu skye bar rigs pa med pa de/ nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no// des na nu la rang bzhin du bye brag gyur pa med pas
113b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu med pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi ma ldan yang 'ba' zhig pa rnams la ni 'ba' zhig rang las gzhan nus pa'i phyir mi 'byung ngo // 'bras bu yan lag rgyu la ma tshang bar byung na ni/ dus thams 
113b2(rgyud 'grel): cad du 'bras bu 'byung ste/ de ni med pa'i phyir ro// de bas na gzhung gi tshogs med na brjod bya'i rtogs pa mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du gzhung thabs yin pa dang gzhung yang brjod bya'i don
113b3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba'i 'brel ba'o// de bas na gzhung gi tshogs 'di brjod bya shugs kyi rtogs bya yin la/ dgos pa ni thabs las 'byung ba yin la/ nyid kyis 'brel te de 
113b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag rang nyid kyi 'brel pa'o// de'i phyir gzhung bstan pas blang dang dor ni dgos pa yin no// des cir 'gyur zhe na/ rang gi don phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/ lam gyi rim pas tshogs lam dang 
113b5(rgyud 'grel): drod la sogs pa 'byung ngo // tshu rol gyi ye shes dang mthong sgom la sogs pas 'brel zhes te de ni mthar phyin pa yang bzung ste/ rigs kyi bu rnams dgos pa'o// // de ni me dang du ba bzhin te de dang 
113b6(rgyud 'grel): de las 'byung ba'i 'brel ba ste/ thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba'i tshul gyis 'brel pa'o// des na nyon mongs pa dang shes bya rtsa nas byang ba ni rang don no// 'brel pa la yang de nyid do// sa bon dang 
113b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa ston pa ni rang don phun sum tshogs pa'o// des na dgos pa'i dgos pa yang / gzhan la brten gzhan du mu stegs dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 
113b8(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen pos gzhan mthar phyin pa la sogs pa ni/ dgos pa'i dgos pa'o// des na chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams lani/ rgyud 'di brjod bya'i 'brel pa dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa bstan to// 
114a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas brjod bya dang 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang 'bras bu dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa bzhi nges par bstan to// gang zag dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams ni/ srid 
114a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtsho nges par bzung nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' nges par 'jug pa'i phyir bstan mi dgos so// de ltar brjod bya dang dgos pa brjod nas/ yan lag bstan pa ni gzhung don no// de la
114a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ sdud pa po'i tshig tu smos te/ 'di skad smras pa thos zhes sbyar ro// 'di'i tshe 'di thos gzhan gyi tshe gzhan gyis thos par bstan to// 
114a4(rgyud 'grel): thos pa ni bdag kho nas thos te/ gzhan dang 'brel pa med de/ de ni gzhan thos pa'o// 'di ni ri rab rtsirtse rtsa rgyud nyi khri sum stong kha nas thos pa'o// des ni thos pa dka' ba dang / thos pa mang ba 
114a5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa yang yongs su bzung ngo // gzhan ni wa raNA ser bden pa bzhi la sogs pa ste/ gzhan nye bar 'khor dang / shA ri'i bu la sogs pa'o// gtso 'khor tha dad pa'i phyir ro// 'di skad 
114a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis thos ni rgyal ba mar me mdzad dang / shAkya thub pa dang / gtso bo rdo rje 'chang dang / rnam rgyal la sogs pas thos pa ste/ sngon dang da lta la sogs pa ste/ bar du yang thos pa ste/ gtso ba 
114a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor tha mi dad par bstan to// tha mi dadA na rang gi tshig dang 'gal lo// gcig pa yin pa'i phyir snyam pa la/ gcig kyang mi stong ste/ kun rdzob tu snang ba thams cad kyang / 'khrul pa mi 
114a8(rgyud 'grel): bden pa sgyu ma yin pas don ni stong pa nyid kho na'o zhes rgyud las gsungs pa yin no// tha dad kyang mi 'gal bde bar gshegs pa la skyon gnyis med de/ thams cad zhi ba mya ngan las 
114b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa khams dang skye mched bral bas dus thams cad bdag dang bdag gis stong pa gnyis su med/ zla ba dang chu bzhin no// de bas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni/ phyag na rdo rje 
114b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid de rab bzhin gcig pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdul ba ni/ snang bas snang zhes bstan te me long rkyen gyi gzugs rang la gnyis su snang ba'o// de bzhin du sems 
114b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i smon lam dang snying rje chen po// sems can gzhug pa'i ched du ston pa dang / 'khor ba dang ldan pa dang lam dang dri za'i gzugs dang / phung po dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang / 
114b4(rgyud 'grel): khams dang rnam par byang ba'i 'bras bu dang nyon mongs pa dang mang du bstan pa rnams ni/ sems can gzhug pa'i ched yin pas thos zhes bya/ gzhan nas theg pa bstan pa sems can gzhug pa'i 
114b5(rgyud 'grel): ched du lags/ theg pa med cing 'bras bu med ces gsungs so// des na phyag na rdo rje la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba thos pa ste/ gtso 'khor tha mi dad par bstan to// gcig pa'i phyir
114b6(rgyud 'grel): thos pa dang 'bal snyam pa la mi 'gal te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang phyag na rdo rjer snang la/ de yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ru snang ngo // 'o na de dngos su snang ngam mi sdang ba yin/ 
114b7(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa yin nam ma sprul pa yin/ snang zhing sprul pa yin na sangs rgyas ma yin te/ dngos po tha dad du snang zhing shes pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das ni log pa'i shes 
114b8(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ste/ sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang khyad par med do// de'i phyir de ni sangs rgyas su lta bar mi bya'o// sprul pa ma yin na snang bar mi rigs so// ci'i phyir rgyu med 'bras bu 
115a1(rgyud 'grel): snang phyir/ ri bong du sogs snang bar rig shes bya'o// bden de log pa'i shes pa dang ldan na de gnyis 'byung gi/ de med pa'i phyir de mi 'byung ngo // dngos su sprul yang mi'o/ 
115a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa'i phyir/ de'i rang bzhin der snang ba'o// ma sprul yang rang nyid de'i tshe des 'dul ba la rnam par rgyal bar snang ba'o// de nas bka' la bar med pa'i phyir rang gis thos 
115a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang yang sdud pa pos zos zhes bya'o// 'dir sems can gdul bya ma rtog par ston pa dang sdud pa po tha dad du bya ba med do// smon lam dang thugs rje dpag tu med pa'i 'gro don 'byung ba'i phyir thos 
115a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes sbyar ro// des na skyon de gnyis mi 'byung ste/ de ni skyon thams cad bral ba'i phyir ro// dus kyang de ste de'i tshe de thos gzhan gyi tshe/ gzhan thos pa ste dus kyang de'i tshe zhes bstan to// 'di skad bdag 
115a5(rgyud 'grel): gis thos pa ni e baM mA yA zhes 'byung bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'byung ba lnga rig dang ye shes lnga dang sgra dang skye mched dang / khams bco brgyad dang / g.yo ba dang / mig yo ba dang / rtsa lnga dang 
115a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang dga' ba la sogs pa la'ang shes par bya'o// de dag bstan pa'i yan lag ni/ phyi nang mthar thug rnam pa gsum ci bzhin min dang ji bzhin sgra/ dgongs pas bshad dang dgongs pa min// 
115a7(rgyud 'grel): drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don// phyi ni mi bzad dbyings dang sbyar// nang ni rtsa rlung byang chub sems// rtsa lnga gtum po'i man ngag go/ mthar thug mthong lam ye shes te// dpe ye shes gnyis 
115a8(rgyud 'grel): med phyag rgya chen po'i lam bcu gnyis ni dngos po bral ba des na bral ba'i shes pa'o// gzhan yang phung po lnga dang / tshogs drug dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang khams dang bag chags khams gsum 
115b1(rgyud 'grel): na bag chags rnams de ni brda min skye bo thal ba'i tshig/ dgos pa ma yin zhes su bya// shu tra su tra ma nu da ra dang tan tra yan tra man tra'o// byang sems kyi sems can phal pa rnams thugs rje zag bcas 
115b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad skyob pa'o// sngags dang shes pa ma lus yongs su 'dzin rgyud ni 'khor brgyud de chos nyid byang chub sems// 'di yang gnas pa ma lus stong pas 'dzin par byed// lung las 'di lta ste/ ji lta 
115b3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dul 'gyur bas// sems can ma lus bsad par bya// ma byin len dang brdzun smra dang // de lta de ltar sems can don// 'dod chags la sogs spang bas spyad// sems can kun la phan/ 
115b4(rgyud 'grel): don du// sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyu yi phyir// sems can thams cad bsad nas yang // de la sdig pa mi gos so// sems can kun la par don du// sangs rgyas kun la sbyor ba yis// gzhan gyi nor 
115b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams phrog na yang // de la sdig pa mi gos so// 'dod chags lta bu bde ba med// de ni rgyal ba rnams la phul// sems can don du gzhan bud med// ston pas bsod nams thob par 
115b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// sems can kun la par don du// sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyu yi phyir// mi dge bcu sogs spyad pa yang // bsod nams rnam mang 'phel zhes gsungs// snyoms par 'jug pa 
115b7(rgyud 'grel): nas bzung ba// pa dang ma ni bsad par bya// rgyal po ngan pa bkur mi bya// bram ze'i grong khyer gzhom par bya// des kyang grol bar gsungs pa ste// dgongs pa bshad pa zhes ni bya// 
115b8(rgyud 'grel): drang ba'i don ni theg pa gsum dang dgu ru bstan pa'o// yod pas nyan thos rang rgyal rnams ni smos// phra rab rdzas su 'dod pa nyan thos rnams// byang chub sems dpa' de ni byis pa'i 
116a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin do// med pa zhen cing chags par 'dod pa'i byas pa ste// theg pa dmar pa log pa'i shes pa ste// de mkho de la de'i theg pa bstan// ces rmad las gsungs so// 
116a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag don dang ldan gyur pa// stong nyid rang bzhin lhag pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dngos// thang dor med pa thar pa'i lam// lung las kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
116a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' chen po sbyin po ni bcing ba'o// tshul zhibs nas ye shes kyi bar du ni bcing ba'o// bde ba dang stong pa dang / rig pa dang / bdag med pa ni bcing ba'o// ci'i phyir zhe na bdag thams cad dang bral
116a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir ro// de nas bral ba'i chos la yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi ba po bslab par mi bya'o// des na mu stegs la sogs pa'i bdag lnga dang / byis pa rnams kyi yod pa'i shes pa rnams ni gzhom pa sla'o// 
116a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag med dang rig pa stong la sogs pa phyogs bral gyi bdag rnams ni gzhom pa dka' ba yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba pas ma thar ba stan to// des na 'dod pa lam du byas pa'i bcing ba'o// bya ba 
116a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa thob pa med pa ni nges pa'i don zhes bya'o// de skad gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir de ni dus phun sum tshogs pa'o// gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su na/ shin tu dben pa/ shin tu yongs
116a7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa zhes pas gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa yin te/ gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rmya ba ni ri rab kyi rtse mo ste/ de na no gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang // nor bu bzang po dang lnga rtsen la 
116a8(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ste/ gnod sbyin gos sngon can gyi 'khor du bstan te/ de na ni gnod sbyir ma rungs pa gzhan yang yod pa ste/ de rnams yod pa ni gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su nu ba zhes bya'o// 
116b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dben pa ni stug po bkod pa'i gnas te/ 'di yang dpe shel gsal ba'i nang du chud pa'i dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal ba ni/ gzhal yas khang 'dug pa ni/ ma lus pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyan dang 
116b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa zhes bya'o// de na ye shes chen po ston pa bzhugs te/ 'khor dang chos la sogs pa gcig tu bzhugs te me dang tsha ba bzhin no// rang bzhin gcig par shes par bya'o// des na gnas 
116b3(rgyud 'grel): ni gsum mo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis las kyi khro bo dbang bskur ba zhes bya bar gnas gsum 
116b4(rgyud 'grel): du ston pa gsum tha mi dad par bstar to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan rdo rje zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de rnams kyi gtso bo sbrul sbru lag no rdo rjes 'dul bar bstan to// 
116b5(rgyud 'grel): del ni sbrul gyi rgyun ni/ ny-id las tha me dad pa'i 'khor gyis gnod sbyin rnams ston pa'i gzi brjid kyis nyes pa'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sprul pa'i sbrul gyi rgyan btags ces 
116b6(rgyud 'grel): bya bar bstan to// stag gi sham thabs dang gos sngon po bla gos rnams ni/ gnod sbyin bred pa'i stobs kyis skyabs kyi 'od la phul zhes bya'o// dus gsum bde gshegs zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub 
116b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcul gnas pa'i tshe/ pad+ma stong dang ldan pa'i dbus su bzhag ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis thugs kyi stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje phyung nas phyag na rdo rje 
116b8(rgyud 'grel): lathugs kyi bdag por sdud pa por dbang bskur zhing bka' gnang nas/ las thams cad brting phan chad kyis ces pa'o// mche ba gtsigs pa yid khros pa lta bu/ mig me mngag gi phung po 'dra ba 
117a1(rgyud 'grel): dbugs me ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can zhes bya ba la mche ba gtsigs pa ni log par rtog pa'i bdud rnams za zhing 'joms pa'o// yid khros pas ni don snying rje 
117a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ kun rdzob tu khro bo'i cha byad do// mig me ma dag gi phung po ni// las gnyis la 'jug/ rang smin pa'i las dang bltas pa tsam gyis 'jigs par byed pa'o// dbug 
117a3(rgyud 'grel): me lce ltar 'bar ba ni/ smin ma dang sgra tsam gyi 'dul bar bstan to// 'jigs pa'i nga ro ni ngag gi skyon bzhi dang bral zhing yid kyi zug rngu 'don zhing / hUM dang phaT kyis sgra bsgrags pas// 'khor rnams 
117a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrags pa'o// lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyis brgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa/ klu nag po dang gnyen dga' bos snyun cha brgyan pa zhes pa ni/ lag pa ni sbrul nag po dang ser 
117a5(rgyud 'grel): pos brgyan par shes par bya'o// rkang pa la sbrul nag pos brgyan pa'i ske rags ni dmar por byas pa'o// se ral kha ni klu khong po'i rigs kyis gar shar byas pa'o// klu dga' bo dang nyer 
117a6(rgyud 'grel): dga' bo'i ming yin la/ de dang 'dra ba'i thul dkar pos sman cha brgyan par bstan to// sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i rjod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdugs pa 'bar ba za zhes pa la/ sprul 'bar 
117a7(rgyud 'grel): ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa ni/ dbul nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i// 'bar ba ni nag po la sogs pa'i kha dog bzhi/ sbal rin po che dang ldan pas dbu la brgyan par bstan to// gdug pa 
117a8(rgyud 'grel): za ba na zhal du sbrul nag po gsol bar bstan to// des kyang gtso'i 'dod chags rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa'i skyon dang bral zhing / phyi rol gyi klu'i rigs drag 'dul ba'i nags su 
117b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ bzhin rgyas pa smin ma dang dpral bar bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad can zhes bya ba la ni/ bzhin rgyas par ni stong pa nyid kyi don rgyas par/ gdong gi 'phel ba ste/ 
117b2(rgyud 'grel): lha la sogs pa gdul bya 'dul bar bstan to// ya sos ma mchu mnan pa ni/ ya sos ma mchu'i steng du byin pa ste/ bye brag tu srin po 'dul ba'i rtags so// smin ma dang dpral bar bsdus pa ni khro 
117b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyer gsum dpral bar 'dug pa sku gsum dang ldan pa'i rtags/ gshin rje'i cha byad can ni/ khro bo mi thung gzugs 'dra ba'o// des ni gshin rje'i rigs 'dul ba'o// lce grogs lngar 'gyu ba/ sprul pa 
117b4(rgyud 'grel): ba/ gsus pa che ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ lce grogs ltar 'gru ba ni/ sprul pa glog pas myur ba'o// sbrul za ba'i sprul klu'i nad ngan 'dra bas 'dod chags kyi 
117b5(rgyud 'grel): gdung ba sel ba'o// gsus pa che ba gsus khyim che ba ste/ stong pa nyid kyang bstan to// lag pa brdabs pa ni gtso bo lag pa rdo rje dang ldan pas ma rungs pas 'jigs par byed pa'o// klu'i rgyal po 'dab 
117b6(rgyud 'grel): bzangs ska rags su bcings pa/ al la zhes grags par byed pa zhes pa la/ 'dab bzangs ni sbrul dmar po'i ska rags su bcings pa/ a la la ni de 'dra rgyan cha la ngo mtshar ba'o// de sgrogs pa ni sgra 
117b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs pa'o// rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma 'phrag pa la khur zhes pa la/ rgya mtsho la dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pas phyag na 
117b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i pus mo nub pa/ sku byin po la nyis 'bum drug khri yod pa zhes pa ste/ sprul pa'i sku'i bong tshad bstan to// dbang po dang nyi ma ni thabs shes rab kyi ste/ nang gtso bo bzhugs zhes pa la/ yang na/ 
118a1(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i phrag pa la nyi zla rbab sde zhes pa'i tshad ngo // la la na re lha'i dbang po'i phrug pa la ni TA r+d+ha sde/ de'i steng ra phragar rdo rje bzhugs ces pa ste/ lnga 'du la ba'o// klu thams cad 
118a2(rgyud 'grel): brlag par byed pa/ gad rgyangs chen po rgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa zhes pa la/ klu'i rigs kyis bdag la sogs pa brlag par re// ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra drangs pa'i phyir ro// gad rkyangs ni hub
118a3(rgyud 'grel): ta'i sgra bsgrags pas k+Sha thams cad dadangs shang brgyal te sha rus khro bo kal du stobs zhes pa'o// klu thams cad 'ching bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad 'gugs shing zhi bar mdzad pa zhes 
118a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la/ 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pa 'gugs shing bcing ba ste/ lcags kyu'i sbyor bas bkug nas/ dkar gsum dang mdar gsum dang ldan pa'i gtor ma bzhin zhes pa'o//

118b1(rgyud 'grel): dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// des kyang gnas khyad par can na ston pa yon tan dang ldan par bzhugs pa 
118b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che thams cad ces pas 'khor phun sum tshogs par bstan te/ rang gi 'khor ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' lag 
118b3(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje dang lha dang mi dong mi ma yin la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang rigs lngas khro bo dang lha mo dang / sgom la sogs pa'i nang nas khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal langs te/ 'di skad gsol zhes 
118b4(rgyud 'grel): 'og dang 'brel to// bar du gcod pa'i phyir gnod sbyin smos te gang ba bzang ba dang / nor bu bzang po dang / lnga rtsen la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad do// gnod sbyin mthu bo che thams cad dang / zhes pa la

118b6(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin ma rungs 'dul ba yang shes par bya'o// lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / dri za thams cad dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / zhes pa lha ni brgyad de lha dang lha'i dbang po dang /

119a8(rgyud 'grel): res bla gos sngon po gsol te/ gos sngon po can khyod ci zhes te/ khyod kyi bye ba'i las dang ngo bo ji lta bu lags/ bde gshegs kun gyi sprul pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i ngo bo

120a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa/ phyag rgya ri srung ba dang bsod napas kyi tshogs dang ye shes dngos bsam gzhal yas khang bskyed pa la sogs pa'o// gsang sngags ni gzhal yas khang gi nang du

120b7(rgyud 'grel): hri/ oM badz+rA nr-i trA~M A/ oM badz+ra d+hU badz+dza/ oM badz+rI praSh+Te traM/ A~M badz+ra A le ki Ni/ oM badz+ra kAn+d+he a/ oM badz+ra a kra shAdz+dza/ oM badz+ra pA shi trUM/ oM badz+ra s+phoD+Da tsa~M/ oM badz+ra b+hin+de no/ oM bud

122a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang yang snga ma bzhin du blang ba ste/ gong du bstan pa 'dir mi bshad do// des gtor ma dang bstod pa thun gyi bar du byas te/ bzlas pa bya ba ni/ rin po che'i pho brang du sems pa sum brtse ga/

122b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa// cho ga'i sbyor ba mkhas par bya// zhes pa ste/ bla ma'i man ngag la rag las pa'o// yang shi ba la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ phyag rgya gsang sngags gsungs te/ rgyas par ro bsreg cho gnas

122b8(rgyud 'grel): lAM bar shudad+ha/ shud d+ho hi zhes brjod do// bsreg khang la bskor ba byas te ro bsreg khang du bzhag la/ rang sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa gzung ba dang lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms la/ bde 
123a1(rgyud 'grel): bar gshegs pa spyan drang ba dang / bzhugs su gsol ba yan chod bya ste/ rdul tshon gyi steng gi nam mkha' la mchod pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang rin po che sna bdun dang rdo rje 
123a2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo mchod pa dang / bstod pa la sogs pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byas la/ gtsang gtor dang 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa dang mgron bskyed pa dang / gtor ma 
123a3(rgyud 'grel): dbul ba la sogs pa'o// tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po gzugs khams lnga tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig bcad yang phyi rgyud bzhin brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du gtor ma 
123a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa yang dga' ba'i tshal dang / lha rnams dang / spyan drang ba dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang bstod pa dang sngags kyis dbul ba la sogs pa bya'o// gtor ma phul te/ ngan song yongs su 
123a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyong ba'i sngags dang / ye shes pa'i 'od zer gyis gshin gyi las sbyang ba la sogs pa bya zhes so// tha mar gshin dang yongs su 'brel pa'i smon lam bad ba la rus bu tsha tshar yongasu 
123a6(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya zhes 'brel to// de ni byin rlabs mtshan sna tshogs dang / de nyid des 'grub gdon mi za zhes bya'o// yang phyag rgya gsang sngags thugs sbyor la zhes pa la/ gsang ba'i 
123a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang / rtsa rlung thig le dang / byang chub sems dang rin pa lnga la sogs pa yang sbyar bar shes par bya'o// rang gzhan 'phags dang bla ma dang // shin tu 
123a8(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa la mchod na// dngos grub myur du 'byung zhes pa la// rang ngam gzhan gyis 'phags pa ste// dkon mchog gsum mam// rang gi lhag pa'i dngos sam yid kyis mchod 
123b1(rgyud 'grel): ces pa'o// bla ma'i sde snod gsum ston pa'i bla ste/ byin gyis rlob pa dang 'dren pa yang yongs su gsung ngo // shin du bla ma dam pa ni gsang ba bla na med pa'i slob dpon ste/ de la dngos sam 
123b2(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis mchod na/ 'dodra ba'i don myur zhes pa'o// tshigs gsum gyis ni bskyed pa'i skabs su/ tshogs pa'i cho ga bstan to// gal te gzhan la phan 'dogs na/ sku de sna tshogs sku ru 
123b3(rgyud 'grel): snang / snang ba sgyu ma'i sku yin te/ zhes pa la/ gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i ni sbal sku'o// sku de sna tshogs sku ru snang // zhes pa la/ gang dang gang 'dul ba de dang de ru snang ste/ des de'i don byed 
123b4(rgyud 'grel): ces pa'i don to// lha'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba yod pa ma yin te/ sgyu ma'am rmi lam du snang gis don dam pa la med ces bya'o// 'o na sgo med na snang bar mi rigs so snyam na/ gdug pa 
123b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dul phyir rags pa'i sku ston to// sna tshogs de nyid bsam bral bas// dngos gzhi thar par yang dag gcig ces pa la/ sna tshogs dngos po'i don to// bsam pa ni shes pa'o// ngo bo ni sna 
123b6(rgyud 'grel): tshegs par snang ba'o// de yang lung las chu rdul 'ja' snang ba bzhin// sems nyid dngos po yul du snang zhes pa'o// 'o na sems nyid dngos por bden nam snyam pa la shes par snang yang 
123b7(rgyud 'grel): shes par mi bden te/ rigs pas brtags na snang ba nyid// dngos po stong pa nyid ces gsungs so// stong pa yang bde ba dang snang ba'o// snang ba yang bde stong de bzhin nyid// thar par
123b8(rgyud 'grel): yang dag gcig ni bden pa gnyis las 'das te dngos po la bden pa gnyis po yang ma bstan ces bya'o// gnyis sam gcig du yang ma grub pa sde gnyis med pasam bral dngos kyi don
124a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs so// de sar sna tshogs sems kyi cho 'bral te/ sems las ma rtogs chos gzhan med// chos su snang ba 'khrul ba'i sems// sems nyid de yang skye med 
124a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// yod med mtha' las 'das pa'o// bsapa du med de brjod du med// ming med tshig med yi ge med ces gsungs so// le'u gnyis pa ni grangs kyi gnyis pa'o// lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las// 
124a3(rgyud 'grel): le'u gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o// // de ltar le'u gnyis par bdag don dang gzhan don bstan yang / gos sngon po can gyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang / mtha' skar ma shes na/ grub par mi 'gyur bas/ 
124a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyir de la de bstan to// de nas yang 'khor gyi nang nas khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa g.yas su sbyar nas 'di skad ga sol zhes sbyar ro// yang gsungs pa gang //

124a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ting nge 'dzin gyi las ma yin te/ rtsa sngags dang las 'grub pa dang / sham bu sngags bstan to// da ha zhes pas sngags sngon du bstan to sreg par byed pa rtsa ba'i sngags dang / da ha daha pa tsa zhes

124a8(rgyud 'grel): par brgyad// de la gnyis kyi gong ldan pas// zung rab zung ming dang ldan pa// yang ming skul dang bsam gtan ni// lcags kyu sbyor bas rab tu bya/ zhes pa la/ gnyis kyi 'og ma ni shes rab 
124b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi yi ge gnyis pa'o// gsum pa thabs kyi yi ge ring po gsum pa'o// rgyan ni drag pa gnyis pa'o// de la gnyis kyi gong ldan pa ni// thabs kyi yi ge zad pa'o// gong ma ste hwa'o ldan pa ni thabs 
124b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsum pa'i mtha' 'o// gr-ih+Na gr-i h+na ste zung rab tu zung ba'o// yang ming che ge mo zhes bya ba'o// bsam gtan ni lcags kyu thogs pa'i khro bo rnams so// rang gi lag pas lkugs 
124b3(rgyud 'grel): kyu'i phyag rgya bca' zhes pa'o// sngags ni dngos su bas pa te/ lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas/ gong gi sngags bzlas pas 'gugs pa thogs pa med pa zhes pa'o// mjug rdzogs gong dang 
124b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa'i mtha'// lan gnyis gong bzhin brdeg sngags shes// zhes pa mjug rdzogs shwa gsum pa thabs kyi yi ge kho na'o// gong ni ha 'o gnyis gong bzhin ni ha nA ha ra zhes brjod pas// 
124b5(rgyud 'grel): rang dang 'brel pa'i sngags brjod pas ral gri dang mtshen thogs pa'i khro bo rnams kyis gnad sar mtshon rgyob cig pa'o// gsum pa'i dang po'i gnyis pa dang // gong gi drug pa'i thabs yi 
124b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan// lan gnyis gong bzhin rtogs byed sngags// zhes pa la/ gsum pa'i dang po ni phag yig ta'o// gnyis pa ni tha'o// gong gi drug pa ni po yig ya'o// lan gnyis gong bzhin brdeg 
124b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags shes ni/ tho ba dang / thog dang / rdo rje rnams kyis brdung sna rab tu brdungs shig pa'o// gnyis dang lnga pa'i dang po la drag po'i dga' ba'i sa bon ldan/ lan gnyis lan 'gyur las 
124b8(rgyud 'grel): 'grub pa gong ma bzhin du mchod byed do zhes pa la/ gnyis pa ni thabs kyi ste/ gtso bo dang po sde gong bzhin du shes par bya'o// lnga pa'i dang po'o// drag po dga' ba ni ha'o// lan gnyis ni pa 
125a1(rgyud 'grel): tsa ta zhes pa spud gnyis so// las grub pa ni gang byas pa ste grub pa'o// chod byed ni mtshan dang thobs tshogs shin tu tshogs la bsregs shig pa'o// le'u ba supa pa ni grangs 
125a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gsum pa'o// lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las le'u gsum pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o// // de ltar sngags btu ba bshad kyang rtsa ba'i sngags dang sham bu ma bstan na gang la bya ba mi 'grub pas/

127a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// ud pa na thun mong gi dngos grub bo// a kar Sha ya dgug pa'o// kha shing kha ra rar mi mngon zhing 'gugs su gzhug pa'o// rAka bsrung ba'o// mo ha ya don

128a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bros pa'o// bar khang deng nad pa la bri bdud dang bdud rtsi'i de bes khrus bya'o// nang gi khrus stong pa nyid bsgom mo// der slob dpon la yon gyis mnyes par bya'o// nang du bum pa'i dbang

128a8(rgyud 'grel): gtarat+na badz+ra a b+hiShiny+tsa hA/ zhes pas dbu rgyan dang 'brel pas nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga taM sa ma d+ha a b+hi Shi&hAM/ zhes pas rdo rje dang 'brel pas 'dod chags rnam par 
128b1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'o// oM sarba ta thAg ta praHbe ka/ a b+hiShiny+tsa trAM/ zhes pas dril bu dang 'brel pas phrag dog sel ba'o// oM san ta thAg tA ki d+hA rAt+tA ra a b+hi Shiny+tsadz+haiM/ zhes pa gti mag rnam par dag ste/ 
128b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes la dbang ba'o// de nas ngas gsupa sangs rgyas kyis dbang bsrung zhing // oM sarba ta thAg ta a b+hiShe ka a b+hi Shits+tsha hUM hUM b+h+rUM sa brjod do// de nA~M sa~M las tha dad pa dang dbang yang bskur te/ 
128b3(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i dbang yang bskur te/ thig le dkar dpar spel bzhag ste/ gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM trAM hUM zhes brjod do// de nas slob dpon gyis lha bsgobs shig pa dang sngags la sogs pa'i gnang ba 
128b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'o// de yang dbang bskur ba'i rgyud nas/ nyan cing sgrub pa la sogs pa// dbang bsgyur gnang bar ma byas na// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// des na dbang bskur rab tu ces// zhes 
128b5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so// de ltar byas pas sdug bsngal nad dang ngan 'gro las bzlog/ ces gsungs so// kye ho/ nyen rnams 'dral ba'i mchog/ e ma sngags chen drag po che// e ma ma rungs 'jigs pa 
128b6(rgyud 'grel): pa can// zhes pa la/ dbang bskur bstod pa bstan pa yin te/ dbang gA lha dang rtsa sngags 'brel par bzlas pa la ngo mtshar bstod pa'o// e ma sngags chen dbang dang 'brel pa'i klu yi drag sngags so// 
128b7(rgyud 'grel): e ma ma rungs 'jigs pa can ni klu yi gdon dbang dang / las sbyor gyis 'joms pa'o// e ma yang sangs rnal 'byor che// phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// phyogs bral khro bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ zhes pa 
128b8(rgyud 'grel): la/ e ma yang gsang ni smra bcad po'i ngo bo rdo rje shub bu bzlas pa gsang ba'i don bye ba phrag gnyis su bzlas pas/ rnal 'byor lha dang 'brel pas rnal 'byor des bzlas zhes pa'o// gong gi yon tan 
129a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o khyod yin pas khyod la bstod// phyogs bral ni gdul bya ma lus pa dang / ye shes ma lus mnga' ba khyod la bstod// ces gsungs so// le'u bdun ni grangs kyi bdun pa'o// 
129a2(rgyud 'grel): lag na rdo rje rtsa rgyud las/ le'u bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// // gdon bral ba dang dbang bskur ba bstan kyang / gtong ma'i las med na 'grub par mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir de la de bstan to// yang 
129a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi nang nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba stan las langs nas/ 'di skad zhus pa'i tshig le'u kun la sbyar ro// lan gsungs pas de skad gsungs nas/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba'i rjes la 'di 
129a4(rgyud 'grel): skad gsungs so// zhes pa la/ de skad gsungs pa la gong gi tshig go/ 'khor 'ga' min dbang dang rme 'brel lo// 'di skad gsungs ni 'og ma'i tshig rnams so// des de rnams gsungs par bstan to//

129a7(rgyud 'grel): bA ya be ye d+h+wa dzaHkra be da ye hU~M dza I sha na ye dz+dza dza/ heta/ a d+hi pa ta ye hUM dzaHsUr+ya tsan+d+rA ye trA dzaHzhes pas spyan drangs te/ gtor ma phyi rlung bzhin phul la/ gong du bstan pa'i sngags kyi sham bu yang hA ba laM

129b8(rgyud 'grel): sreg pa'o// sregs pa'i thal ba yaM las rlung las gtong ba'o// ba gi chu rgyun gyi bkrus pa'o// yer dbab pa'i sbyor ba bya// zhes pa la/ yaM las rlung ra las me a las ka pA la/ rlung gis bshegs

131a1(rgyud 'grel): dang sang ha ni yab yum gyi sngags so// de la bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa las sbyar ro// gtubs te bzlas pa dang mi gtub pa dang / bde bar gshegs pas gsungs te/ gang la bya ba

133b1(rgyud 'grel): ni bri rdzas ma lus pa ste/ bdug pa dang me tog dang / mar me dang / dri chab dang / zhal zas la sogs pas mchod ces pa'o// ji srid bde ba che ba ni lha mo dkar dmar ser ljang khu mthing khas byang/

133b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bsdu ba dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan par gzung bar bgyi// dkon mchog dam pa bla na med// deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje rigs mchog
133b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po yi// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re
133b8(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du lan drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang so sor gzung // 
134a1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// 
134a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// sdom pa ma lus bdag gis gzung // me bsgral ba ni bdag gis bsgral// mgrol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// dbugs ma byung ba dbugs phyung bgyi// sam+ba 
134a3(rgyud 'grel): can dam pa'i don la dgod// dkyil 'khor me tog sngon por bcas// rdo rje bsnams la dbul bar bgyi// bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i gtor ma sogs// rnam pa kun tu bstan par bgyi// chang gis 'jig 
134a4(rgyud 'grel): rten myos 'gyur te/ rdzang gi myos 'gyur bdag gis spang bar bgyi// sems can ma lus don gyi phyir// snying rje chen po bdag gis bskyed// shes rab stod pa nyid rnams la// rnam pa kun tu smad mi bya// 
134a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can bde ba yad mi dkrug/ ces pa lan gsum gyis sdom pa gzung ste/ phyis mi byed par dam bca' ba'o// sdom pa blangs pa ni khrims las 'dug pa dang 'dra bar bstan te nyes pa
134a6(rgyud 'grel): yod pa'i phyir ro// de nas smon lam gsum gyi tshul du bsngo ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mo// de ni dge ba'i phyogs gzhan yang yongs su gzung ngo // e ma'o ni dgyes pa 
134a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ngo mtshar ba'o// le'u ba cu gnyis pa ni grangs kyi bcu gnyis pa'o// lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rgya cher bshad pa las le'u bcu gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o// // grogs spyod bstan kyang zhi
134a8(rgyud 'grel): drag dang 'byung ba bzhis bstod pa ma bstan na 'grub par mi 'gyur bas de la de bstan to// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ bcom ldan gsang bdag gos sngon can// zhes pa la/ de nas ni le'u 
134b1(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis pa'i rting de nas so// gzhan ni zhi drag gi klu 'dul ba'i bstod pa dang / 'khor lo bzhis bstod pa bstan to// bcom ldan gsang bdag ni/ bdud bzhi 'joms shing ye shes lnga dang 
134b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o// des ni sku gsung thugs kyi bdag por rdo rje rnams yin par bstan to// bsdu ba'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin 'khor ba'i klu rnams bsdu mdzad nas ces pa la/ bsdu ba'i thabs ni
134b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon ri rab kyi rtse la gnod sbyin dang klu'i rigs 'dul ba'i tshe/ klu'i gnod sbyin rnams bsdu ba mdzad ces bstan to// me'i 'khor lo snyoms na sa gsang ba me'i sngags bzlas pas zhes pa 
134b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ me'i snyoms zhugs ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis me brgyad kyi 'khor lor snyoms par bzhugs te/ klu rnams bskrad par bya ba'i don/ me'i rang bzhin ma'i sngags bzlas pas/ klu rnam//

134b6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa/ 'khor gyi klu rnams la 'dir gnas na me yis 'chi bas 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur snyam pa'i 'jigs pa byed/ de nas bdag gi 'khor na mi gnas par 'bros te 'gro//

134b8(rgyud 'grel): shes bdud rtsis gsos te/ gnod pa ma byed par bka' bsgo nas/ rang rang gi gnas su bskyal zhes pa'o// de bzhin du klu'i gdon gyis zhen pa rnams la ni/ me'i ting nge 'dzin ma

139b1(rgyud 'grel): sdom sgrib pa rnams dang bral ba dang // sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad dang yongs bral ba'i// mdze 'bras nad dang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sogs// sdug bsngal rab 'i myur du bde bar shog/ bdag
139b2(rgyud 'grel): dang khams gsum sems can rnams// sdug bsngal ma lus ro bzhi nas// gos sngon dngos grub thob par shog/ 'bogs pa gos sngon po can gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa rdzogs so// 
139b3(rgyud 'grel): skye ba lnga brkyar blo rab sbyangs// sngags kyi theg pa'i bstan bcos 'di// dbu ma'i lta bar yang dag nges// mkhas btsun rnams kyis yongs su gzung // sgrol ma gsal ba zhes bya ba'i 
139b4(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa dge slong klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // 'di ltar ba stabs pa'i dge tshogs ci mchis pas// gnas skabs tshe ring nang med longs spyod ldan// dal 'byor rten 
139b5(rgyud 'grel): thob dam pa'i mgon gyis zir// bcom ldan gos sngon go 'phang thob phyir bsngo// // @// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i sgron ma slob dpon shri b+ha dras mdzad pa bzhugs/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ka la 
139b6(rgyud 'grel): pa sa muts+tsha ya nA ma pra ti/ bod skad du/ rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// skye bo phal cher 'dod pa'i yul la chags shing rang gi 
139b7(rgyud 'grel): bde ba gzhin gyi don du mi sgrub pa/ de la gsang phyir phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rgyud du ma byas sangs rgyas yul du gyur/ gsang ba nyer bkod do nyid de nyid rtog pa bsdus dang me lce 'byed pa la sogs/ 
139b8(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'brangs nas/ ji srid klu yi man ngag ma chad gsang ba'i bdag la bdud de bdag gis bshad// mngon par byang chub sku mnga' ba'i// gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can// 'jig
140a1(rgyud 'grel): rten ltal sogs pas bstod// rdorje'achung ba'i dbang mchog thob// nyi ma dang 'dra'i bdag nyi can// gnyis med lnga grub pa de gnas su// gsang bdag gos sngon dang 
140a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas// 'og man chos dbyings pho brang du// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sprul nas// byang chub mang po'i 'khor dang bcas// stobs chen gsang ba'i don bka' stsal// sprul pa'i 
140a3(rgyud 'grel): sku yi tshul bstan nas// ri rab ri'i rtse mo la// lha srin sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas// gsang chen rgud dang thun mong dag/ legs par bstan pa'i don rnams la// sde tshan lnga lnga nyi shu lnga// 
140a4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' dang lhag pa'i mtha' bcas pa// sum cu rtsa bzhi rtse bar ldan// yan lag rgyud ni grangs las 'das// de dag gsum mam bzhir 'dus te// rtsa ba bshad dang phyi ma dang // phyi ma'i 
140a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud du nges par gsungs// de dag don 'di thub chen dang // rdo rje 'chang dang gos sngon can// de la sogs pas rgyas par gsungs// de nyid bsdus pa'i don gsum ste// bskyed rdzogs grogs 
140a6(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam pa gsum// bskyed pa dag ni gnyis yin te// rim gyis bskyed dang cig cang ba// yi ge phyag mtshan skur gyur pa// rim gyis bskyed pa zhes sugasungs// dran pas ldang ba chu 
140a7(rgyud 'grel): brang tshul// tsAs char bstod pa zhes su gsungs// rdzogs pa'i don ni rnam gnyis de// rim gyis 'jug dang cig cher 'jug/ rtsa dang yan lag rten byed pa// rim gyis 'jug pa'i tshul du 
140a8(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// cig car 'jug pa zhes bya ba// d+ha dang 'bras bu skad cig ma// khyad par rgyud kyi dbang du gsungs// grogs ni dam tshig shes rab dang // snying rje 'khor lo lo sogs dang / 
140b1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par spyod pa'i don shes pa'o// de dag bshad pa'i yan lag ni// drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don// dgongs pas bshad dang dgongs pa min// ji bzhin sgra dang ji bzhin min// de dag bshad 
140b2(rgyud 'grel): ba rnam pa gsum// dgongs pa'i gzhi dang gang zag dang // dgongs pa ston dang bcas pa'o// sems can mos pa mi mthun pas// gsang ba ma yin so sor ston// drang ba'i don dugs/ 
140b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// yang dag don dang ldan pa la// de nyid man ngag rab ston po// nges pa'i don du 'gyur ba yin// ma byin len pa la sogs pa// spyad pas grol bar gsungs pa ste// dgongs pas/ 
140b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa zhes su gsungs// dri nyidang don dang mthun gyur pa// dgongs pa min pa zhes su gsungs// shra kra su ka zhes pa dang // mnu ta ra zhes bya ba// ji bzhin ma yin sgra ru 'dod// phung po 
140b5(rgyud 'grel): khams dang skye mched la// de nyid brda min skye bo'i tshig/ rgyud kyi bshad pa mdor bsdus yin// de la gsang ba'i bdag po lAg na rdo rje'i rgyud du legs par ma gsungs te// de'i don ma 
140b6(rgyud 'grel): lus pa bshod pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas bshad par bya dgongs so// 'o na rtsa ba'i rgyud du legs par ma gsungs pa ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni gang zag gzu lums mkhan gyis rang
140b7(rgyud 'grel): dgar spyad kyis dogs pa'i phyir ro// 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can gyi don la ma khyab pas lung dang 'gal lo zhe na ma yin te/ sems can thams cad theg pa chen 
140b8(rgyud 'grel): po'i rigs can du gyur na ni bden te de ma yin/ 'di ni gang zag theg pa chen pa'i rigs can ma yin pa la ma bstan te/ de yang thugs rjes ma khyab pa ma yin te/ de la de'i rnam par ston pa'i 
141a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro// de ni lung gzhan dag las kyang / theg chen rigs min 'og ma pa// gsang ba'i don 'di thos na skrag/ gang zag gzu lums mkhan dag ni// bla ma'i kha dang rab bral 
141a2(rgyud 'grel): nas// thugs thub gzu lums ras chod byed// de ni ngan song sdug bsngal myong // de bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar rnam par sprul// zhes pa'o// 
141a3(rgyud 'grel): de la re zhig dang por rgyud kyi byung khungs gdab par bya ste/ de yang le'u dang pos ni rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bstan to// le'u gnyis pas ni bskyed rdzogs rim gyis 'byung ba bstan to// le'u gsum 
141a4(rgyud 'grel): pas ni las sna tshogs kyi sngags bstan to// le'u bzhi pas ni sreg pa'i sngags la sogs pa'i nus pa'i yon tan bstan to// le'u lnga pas ni 'khor lo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi don bstan to// 9

141a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsta / pa sa na m+b+ha drug cing drug nas pa dang banas pasnyen na// 99 phyin ga ci ba bsta kaM/ skye tsun ni rnab pa 'i myed pa'i tshig bstan/ 
141a7(rgyud 'grel): le'u bcu gsum pas ni 'khor lo brgyad kyi yan lag dang yon tan 'byung ba bstan to// le'u bcu bzhi pas ni rdzogs rim 'ba' zhig bstan to// le'u bco lnga pas ni rjes su yi rang ba'i bstod pa
